tika-vin05t:205_3: Sace bhikkhūhi pariccattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sāmiko vā tassa puttadhītaro vā añño vā koci vaṃse uppanno puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:205_4: Pacchinne kulavaṃse yo tassa janapadassa sāmiko,
tika-vin05t:205_5: so acchinditvā kappiyavohārena puna deti cittalapabbate bhikkhunā nīhaṭaudakavāhakaṃ aḷanāgarājamahesī viya,
tika-vin05t:205_7: Kappiyavohārepi udakavasena paṭiggahitataḷāke suddhacittānaṃ mattikuddharaṇapāḷibandhanādīni ca kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:205_8: Taṃ nissāya pana sassaṃ karonte disvā kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:205_16: Abyattena pana lajjibhikkhunā kārāpitesu kiñcāpi paṭiggahaṇaṃ kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:205_17: bhikkhussa pana payogapaccayā uppannena missattā visagatapiṇḍapāto viya akappiyamaṃsarasamissabhojanaṃ viya ca dubbinibhogaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:206_5: tīrasamīpe udakaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ udakameva vicāreti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:206_8: “sassaṃ katvā āharathā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:206_9: Sace pana taḷāke atibahuṃ udakaṃ disvā passato vā piṭṭhito vā mātikaṃ nīharāpeti,
tika-vin05t:206_11: porāṇakedāresu vā pakatibhāgaṃ aggahetvā atirekaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:206_12: navasasse vā aparicchinnabhāge “ettake kahāpaṇe dethā”ti kahāpaṇe uṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin05t:207_0: Yo pana “kasatha vapathā”ti avatvā “ettakāya bhūmiyā ettako nāma bhāgo”ti evaṃ bhūmiṃ vā patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin05t:207_2: ettakaṃ nāma bhāgaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadantesu kassakesu bhūmippamāṇagahaṇatthaṃ rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vā mināti,
tika-vin05t:207_7: Sace kassakā kahāpaṇe āharitvā “ime saṅghassa āhaṭā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin05t:207_8: aññataro ca bhikkhu “na saṅgho kahāpaṇe khādatī”ti saññāya “ettakehi kahāpaṇehi sāṭake āharatha,
tika-vin05t:207_13: Sace dhaññaṃ āharitvā “idaṃ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti,
tika-vin05t:207_14: aññataro ca bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:207_18: Sace taṇḍulaṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā āharitvā “idaṃ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti,
tika-vin05t:207_19: aññataro ca bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi taṇḍulehi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:208_1: Pubbe pana cittalapabbate eko bhikkhu catusāladvāre “aho vata sve saṅghassa ettakappamāṇe pūve paceyyu”nti
tika-vin05t:208_3: Taṃ disvā cheko ārāmiko tatheva katvā dutiyadivase bheriyā ākoṭitāya sannipatite saṅghe pūvaṃ gahetvā saṅghattheraṃ āha – “bhante,
tika-vin05t:208_6: ekena ayyena catusāladvāre pūvatthāya saññā katā,
tika-vin05t:208_7: ito dāni pabhuti ayyā attano attano cittānurūpaṃ vadantu,
tika-vin05t:208_11: Evaṃ pubbe tatruppādaṃ na paribhuñjiṃsu. Tasmā –
tika-vin05t:211_0: Yo cāyaṃ taḷāke vutto, pokkharaṇīudakavāhakamātikādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:212_1: Pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaucchuphalāphalādīnaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ kiñci khettaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā “dammī”ti vuttepi
tika-vin05t:212_2: “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā taḷāke vuttanayeneva yadā kappiyavohārena “catupaccayaparibhogatthāya dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:212_4: “vanaṃ dammi araññaṃ dammī”ti vutte pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:212_5: Sace manussā bhikkhūhi anāṇattāyeva tattha rukkhe chinditvā aparaṇṇādīni sampādetvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhāgaṃ denti, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:212_7: Sace kenacideva antarāyena tesu pakkantesu aññe karonti,
tika-vin05t:212_12: tato vattabbā “te saṅghassa idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adaṃsū”ti.
tika-vin05t:213_0: Kiñci sassuṭṭhānakaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ sandhāya “sīmaṃ demā”ti vadanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:213_1: Sīmaparicchedanatthaṃ pana thambhā vā pāsāṇā vā sayaṃ na ṭhapetabbā,
tika-vin05t:213_4: Ārāmikānaṃ pana vattabbaṃ “iminā ṭhānena amhākaṃ sīmā gatā”ti.
tika-vin05t:213_7: Yadi pana rājarājamahāmattādayo sayameva thambhe ṭhapāpetvā “cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti denti,
tika-vin05t:214_0: Sace koci antosīmāyaṃ taḷākaṃ vā khaṇati,
tika-vin05t:214_4: Sace saṅgho kiñci labhitvā āmisagarukatāya na vāreti,
tika-vin05t:214_7: Sace eko bhikkhu na vāreti “netha tumhe”ti,
tika-vin05t:214_11: Saṅghikesu hi kammesu yo dhammakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:214_15: upari gahitaṃ paṃsuṃ upari pakkhipitvā pūretabbā.
tika-vin05t:215_0: Sace koci yathājātameva ucchuṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā alābukumbhaṇḍādikaṃ vā valliphalaṃ dātukāmo “etaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:215_2: saha vatthunā parāmaṭṭhattā na vaṭṭatīti mahāsumatthero āha.
tika-vin05t:215_11: Sace ārāmiko purebhattampi pacchābhattampi saṅghasseva kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:215_12: sāmaṇerassa viya sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭijagganampi tassa kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:215_16: Yepi pañcadivasavārena vā pakkhavārena vā saṅghassa kammaṃ katvā sesakāle attano kammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:215_17: tesampi karaṇakāleyeva bhattañca nivāpo ca dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:215_24: Yaṃ kiñci rajakadāsampi pesakāradāsampi ārāmikanāmena sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:216_11: mayaṃ ime gahetvā tumhākaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ dassāmā”ti gaṇhanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:216_15: imaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demā”ti vutte paṭikkhipituṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin05t:217_1: Sace koci bhikkhuṃ uddissa dūtena hiraññasuvaṇṇādicīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya “iminā cīvaracetāpannena
tika-vin05t:217_2: cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti,
tika-vin05t:217_3: so ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-vin05t:217_6: tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:217_8: cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti.
tika-vin05t:217_9: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti,
tika-vin05t:217_10: cīvaratthikena bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:217_12: Na vattabbo “tassa dehī”ti vā “so vā nikkhipissati,
tika-vin05t:217_15: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “yaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-vin05t:217_20: Cīvaratthikena bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo “attho me, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:217_26: Sace dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeti,
tika-vin05t:217_29: tattha gantvā catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:218_19: Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā chakkhattuṃ codeti,
tika-vin05t:218_22: tattha ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā dvādasakkhattuṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:218_23: sakimeva vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:218_26: Tato ce uttari vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeti,
tika-vin05t:218_30: yato rājato rājamahāmattato vā assa bhikkhuno taṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ ānītaṃ,
tika-vin05t:218_32: dūto vā pāhetabbo “yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha,
tika-vin05t:218_33: na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti,
tika-vin05t:219_3: Ayañhi kappiyakārako nāma saṅkhepato duvidho niddiṭṭho aniddiṭṭho ca.
tika-vin05t:219_4: Tattha niddiṭṭho duvidho bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho dūtena niddiṭṭhoti.
tika-vin05t:219_6: Tesu bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho sammukhāsammukhavasena catubbidho hoti,
tika-vin05t:219_8: Idhekacco bhikkhussa cīvaratthāya dūtena akappiyavatthuṃ pahiṇati,
tika-vin05t:219_15: puññatthikehi ca upāsakehi “bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”ti āṇattā vā,
tika-vin05t:219_16: bhikkhūnaṃ vā sandiṭṭhasambhattā keci veyyāvaccakarā honti,
tika-vin05t:219_17: tesaṃ aññataro tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti,
tika-vin05t:219_19: dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati,
tika-vin05t:220_0: No ce bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti,
tika-vin05t:220_1: apica kho bhikkhu niddisati “asukasmiṃ nāma gāme itthannāmo bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti,
tika-vin05t:220_2: so gantvā tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dadeyyāsī”ti āgantvā bhikkhussa ārocetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:221_0: Na heva kho so dūto attanā āgantvā āroceti,
tika-vin05t:221_1: apica kho aññaṃ pahiṇati “dinnaṃ mayā, bhante,
tika-vin05t:222_1: apica gacchantova bhikkhuṃ vadati “ahaṃ tassa hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi,
tika-vin05t:222_3: ayaṃ tatiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā nāma.
tika-vin05t:223_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito natthitāya vā avicāretukāmatāya vā “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:223_2: dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “imassa hatthato cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:223_3: ayaṃ dūtena sammukhāniddiṭṭhoti evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho.
tika-vin05t:224_0: Aparo dūto gāmaṃ pavisitvā attanā abhirucitassa kassaci hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā purimanayeneva āgantvā vā āroceti,
tika-vin05t:224_1: aññaṃ vā pahiṇati “ahaṃ asukassa nāma hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi,
tika-vin05t:224_2: tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā vā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:224_3: ayaṃ tatiyo dūtena asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro dūtena niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā nāma.
tika-vin05t:225_3: te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti ‘iminā yaṃ ayyassa kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:226_1: mūlaṃ asādiyantena sahassakkhattumpi codanāya vā ṭhānena vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:227_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:227_2: ahaṃ ayyassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā dassāmī”ti vadati.
tika-vin05t:227_3: Dūto “handa bho dadeyyāsī”ti tassa hatthe datvā bhikkhussa anārocetvāva gacchati,
tika-vin05t:227_5: Aparo bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākassa vā aññassa vā hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ dadeyyāsī”ti ettova pakkamati,
tika-vin05t:227_6: ayaṃ parammukhākappiyakārakoti ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā nāma.
tika-vin05t:227_11: Yathā ca dūtassa hatthe cīvaratthāya akappiyavatthumhi pesite vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin05t:227_12: evaṃ piṇḍapātādīnampi atthāya pesite sayaṃ āgantvā dīyamāne ca vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:228_2: kiñci akappiyavatthuṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti vutte sacepi cittena sādiyati,
tika-vin05t:228_4: kāyena vā vācāya vā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:228_5: Kāyavācāhi vā appaṭikkhipitvāpi suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ kappatī”ti na sādiyati,
tika-vin05t:228_7: Tīsu dvāresu hi yena kenaci paṭikkhittaṃ paṭikkhittameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:228_8: Sace pana kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena adhivāseti,
tika-vin05t:228_9: kāyavācāhi kattabbassa paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin05t:229_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā pādamūle ṭhapeti “tuyhidaṃ hotū”ti,
tika-vin05t:229_3: añño tattha āgantvā pucchati “kiṃ, bhante, ida”nti,
tika-vin05t:229_4: yaṃ tena ca attanā ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:229_10: Ettāvatā kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:229_12: Sace kiñci vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā gahetvā āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:229_22: Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:229_23: So ce taṃ gahetvā tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:230_4: Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā
tika-vin05t:230_5: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:230_10: Sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā upāsako vā,
tika-vin05t:230_14: na vattabbo “imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā”ti,
tika-vin05t:230_15: kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā.
tika-vin05t:230_16: Ācikkhantena ca “iminā sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā āharā”ti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:230_18: Sace so tena parivattetvā kappiyaṃ āharati,
tika-vin05t:231_0: Aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāgampi labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:231_1: antamaso makkaṭādīhi tato haritvā araññe ṭhapitaṃ vā tesaṃ hatthato gaḷitaṃ vā tiracchānapaṭiggahitampi paṃsukūlampi na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:231_2: Tato āhaṭena phāṇitena senāsanadhūpanampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:231_3: Sappinā vā telena vā padīpaṃ katvā dīpāloke nipajjituṃ,
tika-vin05t:231_6: Telamadhuphāṇitehi pana sarīre vaṇaṃ makkhetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:231_12: Taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā katena maggenapi setunāpi nāvāyapi uḷumpenāpi gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:231_13: Tena vatthunā khaṇāpitāya pokkharaṇiyā ubbhidodakaṃ pātuṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:231_14: Anto udake pana asati aññaṃ āgantukaṃ udakaṃ vā vassodakaṃ vā paviṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:231_17: Taṃ vatthuṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati,
tika-vin05t:231_24: Sace bhūmiṃyeva kiṇitvā aññāni bījāni ropitāni,
tika-vin05t:231_28: bhūmiyaṃ nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:232_0: Sace pana tattha āgato kappiyakārako taṃ parivattetvā saṅghassa kappiyaṃ sappitelādiṃ āharituṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin05t:232_6: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya,
tika-vin05t:232_13: yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t:233_6: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammuti,
tika-vin05t:234_1: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā nimittaṃ akatvā akkhīni nimīletvā nadiyā vā papāte vā vanagahane vā gūthaṃ viya
tika-vin05t:234_5: Evaṃ jigucchitabbepi rūpiye bhagavā pariyāyena bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogaṃ ācikkhi.
tika-vin05t:234_6: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa pana kenaci pariyāyena tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:234_8: evaṃ asantasambhāvanāya vā kuladūsakakammena vā kuhanādīhi vāuppannapaccayā neva tassa,
tika-vin05t:234_10: dhammena samena uppannāpi apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:234_13: Tattha saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma.
tika-vin05t:234_22: evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti,
tika-vin05t:234_23: paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:235_3: Tañhi “na punevaṃ karissāmī”ti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva sujjhanato “saṃvarasuddhī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin05t:235_5: Tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā “pariyeṭṭhisuddhī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin05t:235_7: Tañhi “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmī”tiādinā nayena vuttena paccavekkhaṇena sujjhanato “paccavekkhaṇasuddhī”ti vuccati,
tika-vin05t:235_8: tena vuttaṃ “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin05t:236_2: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti.
tika-vin05t:236_3: Kiṃ pana te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin05t:236_5: Gihīhi dinnāpi bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti,
tika-vin05t:236_9: Te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjanti.
tika-vin05t:236_10: Iti imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:237_2: Tattha alajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:237_4: Lajjino alajjinā saddhiṃ yāva na jānāti,
tika-vin05t:237_6: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi,
tika-vin05t:237_8: tadā vattabbo “tumhe kāyadvāre vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ karotha,
tika-vin05t:237_14: Yopi attano bhārabhūtena alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:237_19: Alajjino pana alajjināva saddhiṃ paribhoge āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:237_20: Lajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo dvinnaṃ khattiyakumārānaṃ suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ bhojanasadiso.
tika-vin05t:237_28: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “dussīlo saṅghato uddesabhattādīni labhitvā saṅghasseva deti,
tika-vin05t:238_0: Apare dve paggahā dve ca paribhogā –
tika-vin05t:238_9: itaropi “amhākaṃ ācariyo īdiso ca īdiso cā”ti tassa parisati vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
tika-vin05t:238_17: mahābhaye kira ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso paguṇo ahosi.
tika-vin05t:238_18: Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṃ āha “āvuso mahārakkhita,
tika-vin05t:238_24: tumhesu nisinnesu gaṇhissāmī”ti paṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā “bhante,
tika-vin05t:238_27: na īdisassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti āha.
tika-vin05t:238_28: Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā mahāniddesaṃ patiṭṭhāpesunti.
tika-vin05t:242_1: Dānavissāsaggāhehi lābhassa pariṇāmananti ettha tāva dānanti attano santakassa cīvarādiparikkhārassa saddhivihārikādīsu yassa kassaci dānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:242_3: “idaṃ tuyhaṃ demi dadāmi dajjāmi oṇojemi pariccajāmi vissajjāmī”ti vā “itthannāmassa demi…pe…
tika-vin05t:242_10: tava santakaṃ hotī”ti vutte “mama santakaṃ karomi,
tika-vin05t:242_16: sace pana “tava santakaṃ karohī”ti vutte “sādhu, bhante,
tika-vin05t:242_19: Sace pana eko “idaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:242_30: “Itthannāmassa dehī”ti dinnaṃ yāva parassa hatthaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin05t:242_35: Tasmā bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_8: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_16: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_24: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_31: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_39: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti.
tika-vin05t:243_47: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti.
tika-vin05t:244_0: Pariccajitvā dinnaṃ puna kenaci kāraṇena kupito āharāpetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin05t:244_1: Attanā dinnampi hi cīvaraṃ sakasaññāya acchindato nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:244_2: aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ antamaso sūcimpi acchindato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:244_10: so dāni tvaṃ na vattaṃ karosi,
tika-vin05t:244_16: Disāpakkamantaṃ vā pana daharaṃ “nivattetha na”nti bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:244_23: Vibbhamantaṃ vā disvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattaṃ karissatī’ti pattacīvaraṃ adamhā,
tika-vin05t:244_24: so dāni tvaṃ vibbhamitvā carasī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:244_34: vibbhamantassa na demī”ti evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:244_37: vissajjetvā dinnaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:246_2: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa vissāsaṃ gahetuṃ sandiṭṭho ca hoti,
tika-vin05t:247_5: Jīvatīti anuṭṭhānaseyyāya sayitopi yāvajīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin05t:247_6: Gahite ca attamanoti gahite tuṭṭhacitto hoti.
tika-vin05t:247_7: “Evarūpassa santakaṃ gahite me attamano bhavissatī”ti jānantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:247_9: vissāsaggāho pana tīhi aṅgehi ruhati sandiṭṭho, jīvati,
tika-vin05t:247_16: tassa santakaṃ vissāsaggāhena gahitampi puna dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:247_17: Dadamānena ca matakadhanaṃ tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā,
tika-vin05t:247_20: yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena kupito,
tika-vin05t:247_26: Yo pana “mayā tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahitaṃ vā paribhuttaṃ vā”ti vutte “gahitaṃ vā hotu paribhuttaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:247_27: mayā pana taṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:248_1: Lābhassa pariṇāmananti idaṃ pana aññesaṃ atthāya pariṇatalābhassa attano aññassa vā pariṇāmanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:248_3: saṅghassa pariṇataṃ sahadhammikānaṃ vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi “idaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:248_4: pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:248_5: “imassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ aññassa pariṇāmentassa suddhikapācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:248_6: Tasmā yopi vassikasāṭikasamaye mātugharepi saṅghassa pariṇataṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin05t:248_11: gilāno cepi bhikkhusaṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā kiñci yācati,
tika-vin05t:248_13: Sace pana so “tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatāni atthī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
tika-vin05t:248_15: Athāpi naṃ kukkuccāyantaṃ upāsakā vadanti “saṅghopi amhehi dinnameva labhati, gaṇhatha,
tika-vin05t:249_0: Ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññavihāraṃ uddisitvā “asukasmiṃ nāma vihāre saṅghassa dethā”ti pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin05t:249_2: cetiyassa pūjaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:249_3: Cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin05t:249_5: Niyametvā aññacetiyassa atthāya ropitamālāvacchato aññacetiyamhi pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:249_6: ekassa cetiyassa pana chattaṃ vā paṭākaṃ vā āropetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā sesaṃ aññacetiyassa dāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:249_7: Antamaso sunakhassapi pariṇataṃ “imassa sunakhassa mā dehi,
tika-vin05t:249_8: etassa dehī”ti evaṃ aññapuggalassa pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:249_20: yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati,
tika-vin05t:253_1: Pathavīti dve pathavī jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavīti.
tika-vin05t:253_2: Tattha jātā nāma pathavī suddhapaṃsukā suddhamattikā appapāsāṇā appasakkharā appakaṭhalā appamarumbā appavālukā yebhuyyenapaṃsukā yebhuyyenamattikā,
tika-vin05t:253_4: Yopi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho,
tika-vin05t:253_6: Ajātā nāma pathavī suddhapāsāṇā suddhasakkharā suddhakaṭhalā suddhamarumbā suddhavālukā appapaṃsukā appamattikā
tika-vin05t:253_9: Yopi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho,
tika-vin05t:254_0: Tattha jātapathaviṃ khaṇantassa khaṇāpentassa vā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:254_9: taṃ āṇāpetvā khaṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:254_15: imasmiṃ okāse pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:254_19: imasmiṃ okāse kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā khaṇā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:255_1: Pokkharaṇiṃ sodhentehi yo kuṭehi ussiñcituṃ sakkā hoti tanukakaddamo,
tika-vin05t:255_15: devena atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhepi udakeyeva udakassa patitattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:256_4: Udake pariyādinne soṇḍiṃ sodhentehi vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:256_8: Tattha hi deve vassantepi udakeyeva udakaṃ patati.
tika-vin05t:257_0: Purāṇasenāsanaṃ hoti acchadanaṃ vā vinaṭṭhacchadanaṃ vā atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ jātapathavīsaṅkhyameva gacchati,
tika-vin05t:257_1: tato avasesaṃ chadaniṭṭhakaṃ vā gopānasīādikaṃ upakaraṇaṃ vā “iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhāmi,
tika-vin05t:257_2: gopānasiṃ bhittipādaṃ padarattharaṇaṃ pāsādatthambhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti saññāya gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:257_14: taṃ kappiyakārakehi kappiyavohārena apanāmetvā sesaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati udakena temitattā.
tika-vin05t:257_19: tattha laggapaṃsuṃ pana allahatthena chupitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:257_23: Abbhokāse ṭhitamaṇḍapatthambhaṃ ito cito ca sañcāletvā pathaviṃ vikopentena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:257_25: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ sukkhakhāṇukaṃ vā gaṇhantassa eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:258_1: Navakammatthaṃ thambhaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā daṇḍakehi uccāletvā pavaṭṭentā gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:258_4: Atha pana tena apadesena pathaviṃ bhinditukāmāyeva honti, āpatti.
tika-vin05t:258_5: Sākhādīni kaḍḍhantānampi pathaviyaṃ dārūni phālentānampi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:258_6: Pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhisūcikaṇṭakādīsupi yaṃ kiñci ākoṭetuṃ vā pavesetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:258_7: “passāvadhārāya vegena pathaviṃ bhindissāmī”ti evaṃ passāvampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:258_9: “visamabhūmiṃ samaṃ karissāmī”ti sammajjaniyā ghaṃsitumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:258_15: vīriyasampaggahatthaṃ pana samaṇadhammaṃ karontena suddhacittena caṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:258_18: aghaṃsantena pana allahatthaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā rajaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:259_0: Keci kaṇḍukacchuādīhi ābādhikā chinnataṭādīsu aṅgapaccaṅgāni ghaṃsanti,
tika-vin05t:259_4: antamaso pattampi pacanto yattakesu ṭhānesu aggiṃ deti vā dāpeti vā,
tika-vin05t:259_6: tasmā pattaṃ pacantenapi pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva pacitabbo.
tika-vin05t:259_7: Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:259_8: pattapacanakapālassa pana upari aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:259_10: so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā pathaviṃ dahati,
tika-vin05t:259_13: Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṃyeva upari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t:259_15: Na hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:259_17: Sace pana “pathaviṃ appattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmī”ti deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:259_20: Tiṇukkaṃ gahetvā gacchanto hatthe ḍayhamāne bhūmiyaṃ pāteti, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:259_21: Patitaṭṭhāneyeva upādānaṃ datvā aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:259_22: Daḍḍhapathaviyā ca yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ usumāya anugataṃ,
tika-vin05t:260_0: Yo pana ajānanako bhikkhu araṇisahitena aggiṃ nibbattetvā hatthena ukkhipitvā “kiṃ karomī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:260_20: imaṃ paṃsuṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ kappiyavohārena yaṃ kiñci kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:260_21: Aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṃ vilikhanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:260_22: evaṃ asatiyā vilikhantassa bhindantassa vā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:264_1: Bhūtagāmoti pañcahi bījehi jātānaṃ rukkhalatādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:264_4: Tattha mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddi siṅgiveraṃ vacā vacattaṃ ativisaṃ kaṭukarohiṇī usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:264_5: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyanti mūle sañjāyanti,
tika-vin05t:264_7: Khandhabījaṃ nāma assattho nigrodho pilakkho udumbaro kacchako kapitthano,
tika-vin05t:264_8: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi khandhe jāyanti khandhe sañjāyanti,
tika-vin05t:264_11: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi pabbe jāyanti pabbe sañjāyanti,
tika-vin05t:264_14: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi agge jāyanti agge sañjāyanti,
tika-vin05t:264_17: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi bīje jāyanti bīje sañjāyanti,
tika-vin05t:264_19: Tattha bhūtagāme bhūtagāmasaññī chindati vā chindāpeti vā bhindati vā bhindāpeti vā pacati vā pacāpeti vā,
tika-vin05t:265_3: Tattha udakaṭṭho sāsapamattikatilabījakādibhedā sapaṇṇikā ca apaṇṇikā ca sabbā sevālajāti,
tika-vin05t:265_5: Udakapappaṭako nāma upari thaddho pharusavaṇṇo heṭṭhā mudu nīlavaṇṇo hoti.
tika-vin05t:265_6: Tattha yassa sevālassa mūlaṃ oruhitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:265_13: Hatthehi pana ito cito caviyūhitvā nahāyituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:265_15: tasmā na so ettāvatā ṭhānantaraṃ saṅkāmito hoti.
tika-vin05t:265_16: Udakato pana udakena vinā sañcicca ukkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:265_17: udakena saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā puna udake pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:265_18: Uppalinipaduminiādīni jalajavallitiṇāni udakato uddharantassa vā tattheva vikopentassa vā pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:265_21: tilabījakasāsapamattikasevālopi udakato uddhaṭo amilāto aggabījasaṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin05t:265_27: Bhūtagāme hi pācittiyaṃ bījagāme dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:265_28: Asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo nāma tatiyo koṭṭhāso neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:265_31: tampi na yuttaṃ abhūtagāmamūlattā tādisassa bījagāmassāti.
tika-vin05t:266_0: Thalaṭṭhe chinnarukkhānaṃ avasiṭṭho haritakhāṇu nāma hoti,
tika-vin05t:266_5: Kadaliyā pana aphalitāya khāṇu bhūtagāmena saṅgahito,
tika-vin05t:266_20: Maṇḍapatthāya vā vatiatthāya vā valliāropanatthāya vā bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇanti,
tika-vin05t:266_21: mūlesu ceva paṇṇesu ca niggatesu puna bhūtagāmasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:266_22: mūlamattesu pana paṇṇamattesu vā niggatesupi bījagāmena saṅgahitā eva.
tika-vin05t:267_0: Yāni kānici bījāni pathaviyaṃ vā udakena siñcitvā ṭhapitāni,
tika-vin05t:267_1: kapālādīsu vā allapaṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā nikkhittāni honti,
tika-vin05t:267_2: sabbāni mūlamatte vā paṇṇamatte vā niggatepi bījāniyeva.
tika-vin05t:267_3: Sacepi mūlāni ca upari aṅkuro ca niggacchati,
tika-vin05t:267_7: vīhiādīnaṃ vā aṅkure harite nīlavaṇṇe jāte bhūtagāmasaṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin05t:267_8: Tālaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭhamaṃ sūkaradāṭhā viya mūlaṃ niggacchati,
tika-vin05t:267_9: niggatepi yāva upari pattavaṭṭi na niggacchati,
tika-vin05t:267_11: Nāḷikerassa tacaṃ bhinditvā dantasūci viya aṅkuro niggacchati,
tika-vin05t:267_14: Mūle aniggatepi tādisāya pattavaṭṭiyā jātāya amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin05t:268_1: Vandākā vā aññā vā yā kāci rukkhe jāyitvā rukkhaṃ ottharati,
tika-vin05t:268_3: taṃ vikopentassa vā tato uddharantassa vā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:268_8: yāva dve tīṇi pattāni na sañjāyanti,
tika-vin05t:268_11: tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu sudhālepampi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:268_12: anupasampannena littassa upari sinehalepo dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:269_1: Pāsāṇajāti pāsāṇadaddusevālaseleyyakādīni aharitavaṇṇāni apattakāni ca dukkaṭavatthukāni.
tika-vin05t:269_5: allarukkhato pana ahicchattakaṃ gaṇhanto rukkhatacaṃ vikopeti,
tika-vin05t:269_8: Yā pana indasālakakudhādīnaṃ papaṭikā rukkhato muccitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:269_10: Niyyāsampi rukkhato muccitvā ṭhitaṃ sukkharukkhe vā laggaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:269_13: Rukkhaṃ cāletvā paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā pariṇatakaṇikārādipupphaṃ vā pātentassa pācittiyameva.
tika-vin05t:269_14: Hatthakukkuccena mudukesu indasālanuhīkhandhādīsu vā tatthajātakatālapaṇṇādīsu vā akkharaṃ chindantassapi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:269_15: Sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphaṃ ocinantānaṃ sākhaṃ onāmetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:269_16: Tehi pana pupphehi pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:269_20: Kiñci gacchaṃ vālataṃ vā uppāṭentehi sāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:269_21: tesaṃ pana ussāhajananatthaṃ anākaḍḍhantena kaḍḍhanākāraṃ dassentena viya agge gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:269_23: tesaṃ sākhaṃ makkhikabījanādīnaṃ atthāya kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā gahitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:269_24: tace vā patte vā antamaso nakhenapi vilekhantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:269_26: Sace pana kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā sītale padese ṭhapitassa mūlaṃ sañjāyati,
tika-vin05t:269_30: mūle ca aṅkure ca jāte na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:270_0: “Sammuñjanīsalākāyapi tiṇāni chindissāmī”ti bhūmiyaṃ sammajjanto sayaṃ vā chindati,
tika-vin05t:270_5: caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti sañcicca pādehi akkamanto tiṇavalliādīni sayaṃ vā chindati,
tika-vin05t:270_8: Sacepi hi tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā ganthiṃ karontassa bhijjati,
tika-vin05t:270_10: Tālarukkhādīsu pana corānaṃ anāruhaṇatthāya dārumakkaṭakaṃ ākoṭenti,
tika-vin05t:270_17: kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā uppāṭehī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati aniyamitattā.
tika-vin05t:270_18: Niyametvā pana “imaṃ rukkhaṃ chindā”tiādi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:270_19: Nāmaṃ gahetvāpi “ambarukkhaṃ caturaṃsavalliṃ āluvakandaṃ muñjatiṇaṃ asukarukkhacchalliṃ chinda bhinda uppāṭehī”tiādivacanampi aniyamitameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:270_22: Pattampi pacitukāmo tiṇādīnaṃ upari sañcicca aggiṃ karonto sayaṃ vā pacati,
tika-vin05t:270_27: “ime mugge pacā”ti evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:270_29: imaṃ mūlaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā dehi,
tika-vin05t:270_30: imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā āhara,
tika-vin05t:270_32: imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā phalaṃ vā kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:271_1: Paribhuñjantena pana bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:272_2: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ aggiparijitaṃ satthaparijitaṃ nakhaparijitaṃ abījaṃ nibbaṭṭabījaññeva pañcama”nti.
tika-vin05t:273_0: Tattha aggiparijitanti agginā parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ daḍḍhaṃ phuṭṭhanti attho.
tika-vin05t:273_1: Satthaparijitanti satthena parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ chinnaṃ viddhaṃ vāti attho.
tika-vin05t:273_4: Agginā kappiyaṃ karontena kaṭṭhaggigomayaggiādīsu yena kenaci antamaso lohakhaṇḍenapi ādittena kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:273_5: tañca kho ekadese phusantena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:273_6: Satthena karontena yassa kassaci lohamayasatthassa antamaso sūcinakhacchedanānampi tuṇḍena vā dhārāya
tika-vin05t:273_7: vā chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:273_8: Nakhena kappiyaṃ karontena pūtinakhena na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:273_9: manussānaṃ pana sīhabyagghadīpimakkaṭānaṃ sakuntānañca nakhā tikhiṇā honti,
tika-vin05t:273_17: tehi tatthajātakehipi uddharitvā gahitakepi chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:274_1: rukkhasahassaṃ vā chinditvā ekābaddhaṃ katvā ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti,
tika-vin05t:274_2: ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi vā kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:274_3: Ucchū ca dārūni ca ekato baddhāni honti,
tika-vin05t:274_6: Sace pana yāya rajjuyā vā valliyā vā baddhāni,
tika-vin05t:274_10: ekasmiṃ khaṇḍe kappiye kate sabbaṃ katameva.
tika-vin05t:274_15: Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā na santiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin05t:274_17: Kapitthaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati,
tika-vin05t:278_1: Duvidhaṃ sahaseyyakanti “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin05t:278_3: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin05t:278_4: pācittiya”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ sahaseyyasikkhāpadadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:278_6: anupasampannena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ rattīnaṃ upari catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye sabbacchannasabbaparicchanne
tika-vin05t:278_7: yebhuyyacchannayebhuyyaparicchanne vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā ekakkhaṇe vā nipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:278_8: Tattha chadanaṃ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā yena kenaci paricchannampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:278_9: Yaṃ senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paricchannaṃ,
tika-vin05t:278_11: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṃ gahetvā vācuggatavasena “sabbacchannaṃ nāma pañcahi chadanehi channa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:278_13: atha kho dussakuṭiyaṃ sayantassapi na sakkā anāpatti kātuṃ,
tika-vin05t:278_14: tasmā yaṃ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṃ idha chadanañca paricchannañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:278_15: Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi sahaseyyā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin05t:278_16: tasmā yaṃ senāsanaṃ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāvachadanaṃ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenapi parikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin05t:278_18: Chadanaṃ anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittampi sabbaparicchannameva.
tika-vin05t:278_19: Yassa pana upari bahutaraṃ ṭhānaṃ channaṃ,
tika-vin05t:279_0: Iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti,
tika-vin05t:279_3: Evarūpe senāsane anupasampannena saddhiṃ catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye nipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:279_9: bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa āpatti.
tika-vin05t:280_2: Yo hi ekasmiṃ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin05t:280_4: Yopi ekasmiṃyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t:280_5: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t:280_6: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin05t:281_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma “bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenapi saddhiṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:281_1: tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno vasanasenāsane ekūpacāraṭṭhāne sayati,
tika-vin05t:281_3: Yadi pana thambhānaṃ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassa bhittiyā upariṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa
tika-vin05t:281_4: susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:281_7: tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati,
tika-vin05t:281_13: sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsane sayitassa tulāvāḷasaghāṭādīsu kapotādayo sayanti,
tika-vin05t:281_16: Parimaṇḍalaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṃ cepi senāsanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:281_17: tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṃ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre sabbagabbhepi pavisanti,
tika-vin05t:281_18: ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṃ āpatti.
tika-vin05t:281_21: pamukhe sayito gabbhe sayitānaṃ āpattiṃ na karoti.
tika-vin05t:281_23: tatra sayito sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t:282_1: Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatusālasannivesā mahāpāsādā ekasmiṃ okāse pāde dhovitvā paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṃ,
tika-vin05t:282_3: Sace tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne upacāraṃ paricchinditvā katā honti,
tika-vin05t:282_5: Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:282_6: ekena dvārena pavisitvā ekasmiṃ paricchede anupasampanno sayati,
tika-vin05t:282_11: Na hi chiddena gehaṃ ekūpacāraṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:282_16: Na hi dvārapidahanena gehaṃ nānūpacāraṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin05t:282_20: Sace taṃ dvāraṃ puna iṭṭhakāhi pidahanti,
tika-vin05t:282_26: dvinnaṃ kavāṭānaṃ antare anupasampanno antocetiyaghare sayantassa āpattiṃ karoti ekūpacārattā.
tika-vin05t:283_1: senāsanaṃ khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:283_2: aññena saddhiṃ sambandhaṃ vā asambandhaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:283_3: dīghaṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:283_7: Ettha ca yena kenaci paṭicchadanena sabbacchanne sabbaparicchanne pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:283_19: yebhuyyenaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭanti pañca dukkaṭāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:283_29: Yakkhipetīhi pana dissamānakarūpāhi tiracchānagatitthiyā ca methunadhammavatthubhūtāya eva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:287_2: santharitvāna pakkamoti saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvāna aññattha vasitukāmatāya vihārato pakkamanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:288_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya,
tika-vin05t:289_0: Vacanato saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ sayaṃ santharitvā aññena vā santharāpetvā uddharaṇādīni akatvā parikkhittassa ārāmassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin05t:290_0: Tattha seyyā nāma bhisi cimilikā uttarattharaṇaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ taṭṭikā cammakhaṇḍo nisīdanaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti dasavidhā.
tika-vin05t:290_1: Tattha bhisīti mañcakabhisi vā pīṭhakabhisi vā.
tika-vin05t:290_2: Cimilikā nāma sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katā,
tika-vin05t:290_3: taṃ heṭṭhā pattharitvā upari kaṭasārakaṃ pattharanti.
tika-vin05t:290_6: Taṭṭikā nāma tālapaṇṇehi vā vākehi vā katataṭṭikā.
tika-vin05t:290_7: Cammakhaṇḍo nāma sīhabyagghadīpitaracchacammādīsupi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:290_8: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi senāsanaparibhoge paṭikkhittacammaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin05t:290_14: Evaṃ pana imaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ saṅghike vihāre santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā pakkamantena āpucchitvā pakkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:290_15: āpucchantena ca bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo,
tika-vin05t:290_20: tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo,
tika-vin05t:290_21: tasmimpi asati catūsu pāsāṇesu mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce avasesamañcapīṭhāni āropetvā upari bhisiādikaṃ dasavidhampi
tika-vin05t:290_22: seyyaṃ rāsiṃ katvā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānāni pidahitvā gamiyavattaṃ pūretvā
tika-vin05t:291_1: chadanatthañca tiṇaṃ vā iṭṭhakā vā ānītā honti,
tika-vin05t:291_11: abbhokāsepi pāsāṇānaṃ upari mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva nikkhipitvā tiṇehi ca paṇṇehi ca paṭicchādetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:291_13: taṃ aññesaṃ tattha āgatabhikkhūnaṃ upakāraṃ bhavissatīti.
tika-vin05t:291_14: Uddharitvā gacchantena pana mañcapīṭhakavāṭaṃ sabbaṃ apanetvā saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse laggetvāva gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:291_15: Pacchā āgantvā vasanakabhikkhunāpi puna mañcapīṭhaṃ ṭhapayitvā gacchantena tatheva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:291_16: Antokuṭṭato seyyaṃ bahikuṭṭe paññapetvā vasantena gamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:291_17: Uparipāsādato oropetvā heṭṭhāpāsāde vasantassapi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:291_18: Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā bahigamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:292_2: yā tāva bhūmiyaṃ dīghasālā vā paṇṇasālā vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:292_3: yaṃ vā rukkhatthambhesu katagehaṃ upacikānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:292_5: Tasmiñhi katipayāni divasāni ajaggiyamāne vammikāva santiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin05t:292_6: Yaṃ pana pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ siluccayaleṇaṃ vā sudhālittasenāsanaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:292_8: tato pakkamantassa āpucchitvāpi anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:292_10: Sace tādisepi senāsane ekena passena upacikā ārohanti,
tika-vin05t:292_12: Yo pana āgantuko bhikkhu saṅghikasenāsanaṃ gahetvāva santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattanto attano senāsanaṃ aggahetvā vasati,
tika-vin05t:292_15: Yadā pana so senāsanaṃ gahetvā attano issariyena vasati,
tika-vin05t:293_1: sace dve tayo ekato hutvā paññapenti,
tika-vin05t:293_3: Tesu ce paṭhamaṃ gacchanto “pacchimo jaggissatī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gacchati, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:293_8: Aññato mañcapīṭhādīni ānetvā aññatra vasitvā gamanakāle tattheva netabbāni.
tika-vin05t:293_9: Sace aññato ānetvā vasamānassa añño vuḍḍhataro āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:293_13: Tena “evaṃ karissāmī”ti sampaṭicchite itarassa gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:293_14: Evaṃ aññattha haritvāpi saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa hi naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā corehi vā haṭaṃ gīvā neva hoti,
tika-vin05t:293_16: Aññassa mañcapīṭhaṃ pana saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ gīvāyeva.
tika-vin05t:293_17: Antovihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā “ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmī”ti evaṃ sāpekkho nadīpāraṃ gāmantaraṃ vā gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin05t:293_19: nadīpūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibodho hoti upadduto,
tika-vin05t:294_0: Vihārassa upacāre pana upaṭṭhānasālāya vā maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā
tika-vin05t:294_1: vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddharati na uddharāpeti anāpucchaṃ vā gacchati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:294_2: Vuttappakārañhi dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ antogabbhādimhi guttaṭṭhāne paññapetvā gacchantassa yasmā seyyāpi senāsanampi upacikāhi palujjati,
tika-vin05t:294_5: Bahi pana upaṭṭhānasālādīsu paññapetvā gacchantassa seyyāmattameva nasseyya ṭhānassa aguttatāya,
tika-vin05t:294_8: Mañcapīṭhaṃ pana yasmā na sakkā sahasā upacikāhi khāyituṃ,
tika-vin05t:294_9: tasmā taṃ vihārepi santharitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:294_10: Vihārassūpacāre upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ maṇḍape rukkhamūlepi santharitvā pakkamantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:295_1: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā
tika-vin05t:295_2: vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya,
tika-vin05t:295_3: pācittiya”nti vacanato saṅghikāni pana mañcapīṭhādīni cattāri ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā
tika-vin05t:295_4: vā uddharaṇādīni akatvā “ajjeva āgamissāmī”ti gacchantassapi thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātātikkame
tika-vin05t:295_6: Ettha kocchaṃ nāma vākamayaṃ vā usīramayaṃ vā muñjamayaṃ vā pabbajamayaṃ vā heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ
tika-vin05t:296_2: aṭṭha māse avassikasaṅkete maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā yattha kākā vā kulalā vā na ūhadanti,
tika-vin05t:296_3: tattha senāsanaṃ nikkhipitu”nti vacanato pana vassikavassānamāsāti evaṃ apaññāte cattāro hemantike,
tika-vin05t:296_4: cattāro gimhiketi aṭṭha māse sākhāmaṇḍape vā padaramaṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:296_5: Yasmiṃ pana kākā vā kulalā vā aññe vā sakuntā dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasanti,
tika-vin05t:296_7: “Aṭṭha māse”ti vacanato yesu janapadesu vassakāle na vassati,
tika-vin05t:296_8: tesu cattāro māse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:296_10: tattha hemantepi ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:296_11: Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ visuddhaṃ nataṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:296_12: evarūpe kāle kenacideva karaṇīyena ajjhokāse mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:297_4: Saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantena vettena vā vākena vā vītamañcako gahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:297_6: tasmiṃ asati navavāyimo vā onaddhako vā gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:297_7: Gahetvā pana “ahaṃ ukkaṭṭharukkhamūliko ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsiko”ti cīvarakuṭimpi akatvā asamaye ajjhokāse
tika-vin05t:297_8: vā rukkhamūle vā paññapetvā nipajjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:297_9: Sace pana catugguṇenapi cīvarena katā kuṭi atementaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:297_12: Araññe paṇṇakuṭīsu vasantānaṃ sīlasampadāya pasannacittā manussā navaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ denti “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti,
tika-vin05t:297_13: vasitvā gacchantehi sāmantavihāre sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ pesetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:297_16: Cetiyaṅgaṇe sammajjaniṃ gahetvā bhojanasālaṅgaṇaṃ vā uposathāgāraṅgaṇaṃ vā pariveṇadivāṭṭhānaaggisālādīsu
tika-vin05t:297_17: vā aññataraṃ sammajjitvā dhovitvā puna sammajjanimāḷakeyeva ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin05t:297_18: Uposathāgārādīsu aññatarasmiṃ gahetvā avasesāni sammajjantassapi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:298_0: Yo pana bhikkhācāramaggaṃ sammajjanto gantukāmo hoti,
tika-vin05t:298_1: tena sammajjitvā sace antarāmagge sālā atthi,
tika-vin05t:298_5: tāva na vassissatī”ti jānantena yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā puna paccāgacchantena pākatikaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin05t:298_8: Sace pana tatra tatreva sammajjanatthāya sammajjanī nikkhittā hoti,
tika-vin05t:298_9: taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tatra tatreva nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:299_1: Sace vuttappakāraṃ catubbidhampi saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ajjhokāse vā rukkhamūle vā maṇḍape vā anupasampannena santharāpeti,
tika-vin05t:299_8: thero bhojanasālāyaṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā daharaṃ āṇāpeti “gaccha divāṭṭhāne mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:299_10: thero yathāruci vicaritvā tattha gantvā thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin05t:299_12: Nisīditvā sayaṃ gacchanto neva uddharati na uddharāpeti,
tika-vin05t:299_14: Sace pana thero tattha thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvā caṅkamantova daharaṃ “gaccha tva”nti bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:299_22: neva nisīdituṃ na nipajjituṃ demī”ti daharaṃ tajjetiyeva.
tika-vin05t:299_24: sukhaṃ sayathā”ti kappaṃ labhitvā vanditvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:300_0: Atha pana āṇattikkhaṇeyeva daharo “mayhaṃ bhaṇḍe bhaṇḍadhovanādi kiñci karaṇīyaṃ atthī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:300_1: thero pana taṃ “paññapetvā gacchāhī”ti vatvā bhojanasālato nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchati,
tika-vin05t:300_6: sāmaṇere tattha mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā nisinnepi bhojanasālato aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:300_7: Gantvā nisinno puna gamanakāle leḍḍupātātikkame āpattiyā kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:300_8: Sace pana āṇāpento “mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā tattheva nisīdā”ti āṇāpeti,
tika-vin05t:300_11: Sayaṃ pana pākatikaṃ akatvā gacchantassa leḍḍupātātikkame pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:300_12: Antarasannipāte mañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā nisinnehi gamanakāle ārāmikānaṃ “idaṃ paṭisāmethā”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:301_2: tattha uposathāgāratopi bhojanasālatopi āharitvā mañcapīṭhāni paññapenti,
tika-vin05t:301_7: Gamanakāle pākatikaṃ akatvā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantānaṃ āpatti.
tika-vin05t:301_8: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “yāva aññe na nisīdanti,
tika-vin05t:301_12: Sace te anuddharitvā vā anuddharāpetvā vā gacchanti, dukkaṭaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t:301_14: Dhammāsane paññatte yāva ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā nāgacchati,
tika-vin05t:301_18: añño ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā uṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t:301_22: Uṭṭhahantena pana “idamāsanaṃ tumhākaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:301_23: Sacepi itarasmiṃ anāgate paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāya gacchati,
tika-vin05t:301_26: Sace pana itarasmiṃ anāgateyeva paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāyāsanā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamati,
tika-vin05t:301_29: dutiyapāde pācittiya”nti ayaṃ nayo mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttoti.
tika-vin05t:302_1: Sace pana vuttappakārasenāsanato aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ cimilikaṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā taṭṭikaṃ
tika-vin05t:302_2: vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā pādapuñchaniṃ vā phalakapīṭhaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto
tika-vin05t:302_3: neva uddharati na uddharāpeti anāpucchaṃ vā gacchati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:302_4: Ādhārakaṃ pattapidhānakaṃ pādakaṭhalikaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanipattakaṃ yaṃ kiñci dārubhaṇḍaṃ antamaso pānīyauḷuṅkaṃ
tika-vin05t:302_6: Ajjhokāse rajanaṃ pacitvā rajanabhājanaṃ rajanauḷuṅko rajanadoṇikāti sabbaṃ aggisālāya paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:302_9: Tasmimpi asati yattha olokentā bhikkhū passanti,
tika-vin05t:302_15: tassa santakaṃ attano puggalikameva hotī”ti mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:302_17: Yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti,
tika-vin05t:302_20: Yo pana ātape otāpento “āgantvā uddharissāmī”ti gacchati,
tika-vin05t:307_1: Kālikānipi cattārīti ettha yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikanti imāni cattāri kālikāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:307_2: Tattha purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāva majjhanhikasaṅkhato kālo,
tika-vin05t:307_4: Saddhiṃ anulomapānehi aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānaṃ yāva rattiyā pacchimayāmasaṅkhāto yāmo,
tika-vin05t:307_5: tāva paribhuñjitabbato yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikaṃ.
tika-vin05t:307_6: Sappiādi pañcavidhaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ nidhetabbato sattāho kālo assāti sattāhakālikaṃ.
tika-vin05t:307_7: Ṭhapetvā udakaṃ avasesaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvaṃ pariharitvā sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbato yāvajīvikanti vuccati.
tika-vin05t:308_1: Tattha yāvakālikesu bhojanīyaṃ nāma odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti.
tika-vin05t:308_2: Pañca bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin05t:308_3: Ettha pana yaṃ tāva sakkhalimodakādi pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇamayaṃ khādanīyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:308_7: mūlakhādanīyaṃ kandakhādanīyaṃ muḷālakhādanīyaṃ matthakakhādanīyaṃ khandhakhādanīyaṃ tacakhādanīyaṃ pattakhādanīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:309_1: mūlakhādanīye tāva mūlakamūlaṃ khārakamūlaṃ caccumūlaṃ tambakamūlaṃ taṇḍuleyyakamūlaṃ vatthuleyyakamūlaṃ
tika-vin05t:309_3: Ettha ca vajakalimūle jaraṭṭhaṃ chinditvā chaḍḍenti,
tika-vin05t:310_2: mūlāni bhesajjāni haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:310_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin05t:311_2: Tesaṃ cūḷapañcamūlaṃ mahāpañcamūlantiādinā nayena gaṇiyamānānaṃ gaṇanāya anto natthi,
tika-vin05t:311_4: Tasmā yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharati,
tika-vin05t:311_7: Subahuṃ vatvāpi hi imasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:311_8: Nāmasaññāsu pana vuccamānāsu taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva hoti,
tika-vin05t:311_9: tasmā nāmasaññāya ādaraṃ akatvā lakkhaṇameva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:311_13: Yañca taṃ pāḷiyaṃ haliddādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:312_0: Kandakhādanīye duvidho kando dīgho ca bhisakiṃsukakandādi,
tika-vin05t:312_3: Tattha sabbesaṃ kandānaṃ jiṇṇajaraṭṭhaṭṭhānañca challi ca sukhumamūlāni ca yāvajīvikāni,
tika-vin05t:312_4: taruṇo pana sukhakhādanīyo sālakalyāṇipotakakando kiṃsukapotakakando ambāṭakakando ketakakando māluvakando
tika-vin05t:312_5: bhisasaṅkhāto padumapuṇḍarīkakando piṇḍālumasāluādayo ca khīravallikando āluvakando siggukando tālakando
tika-vin05t:312_6: nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ kandā kadalikando veḷukando kaserukakandoti evamādayo tesu tesu
tika-vin05t:312_7: janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakakandā yāvakālikā.
tika-vin05t:312_11: Te pāḷiyaṃ “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitā.
tika-vin05t:313_1: Erakamuḷālaṃ kandulamuḷālanti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakamuḷālaṃ yāvakālikaṃ,
tika-vin05t:313_3: Taṃ sabbampi pāḷiyaṃ “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:314_1: veṇukaḷīro naḷakaḷīro ucchukaḷīro mūlakakaḷīro sāsapakaḷīro satāvarikaḷīro sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ kaḷīrāti
tika-vin05t:314_2: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako rukkhavalliādīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:315_1: daṇḍakakhandhāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
tika-vin05t:315_3: uppalajātīnaṃ paṇṇadaṇḍako padumajātīnaṃ sabbopi daṇḍako karavindadaṇḍādayo ca avasesasabbakhandhā yāvajīvikā.
tika-vin05t:316_3: Tesaṃ pana matthakakhandhatacānaṃ tiṇṇampi pāḷiyaṃ kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:317_2: kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimbakasāvaṃ kuṭajakasāvaṃ paṭolakasāvaṃ phaggavakasāvaṃ nattamālakasāvaṃ,
tika-vin05t:317_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin05t:318_0: Ettha hi etesampi saṅgaho sijjhati. Vuttakasāvāni ca sabbakappiyānīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:319_0: Pattakhādanīye mūlakaṃ khārako caccu tambako taṇḍuleyyako papunnāgo vatthuleyyako vajakali jajjhari sellu
tika-vin05t:319_1: siggu kāsamaddako ummācīnamuggo māso rājamāso ṭhapetvā mahānipphāvaṃ avasesanipphāvo aggimantho sunisannako
tika-vin05t:319_2: setavaraṇo nāḷikā bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti etesaṃ pattāni,
tika-vin05t:319_3: aññāni ca evarūpāni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni pattāni ekaṃsena yāvakālikāni,
tika-vin05t:319_4: yā panaññā mahānakhapiṭṭhimattapaṇṇā loṇirukkhe ca gacche ca ārohati,
tika-vin05t:320_2: paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ kappāsapaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin05t:320_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin05t:321_4: Yāvajīvikapaṇṇānaṃ pana phaggavapaṇṇaṃ ajjukapaṇṇaṃ phaṇijjakapaṇṇaṃ tambūlapaṇṇaṃ paduminipaṇṇanti evaṃ gaṇanavasena anto natthi.
tika-vin05t:322_0: Pupphakhādanīye mūlakapupphaṃ khārakapupphaṃ caccupupphaṃ tambakapupphaṃ vajakalipupphaṃ jajjharipupphaṃ
tika-vin05t:322_1: cūḷanipphāvapupphaṃ mahānipphāvapupphaṃ kaserukapupphaṃ nāḷikeratālaketakānaṃ taruṇapupphāni setavaraṇapupphaṃ
tika-vin05t:322_2: siggupupphaṃ uppalapadumajātikānaṃ pupphānaṃ kaṇṇikāmattaṃ agandhipupphaṃ karīrapupphaṃ jīvantī pupphanti
tika-vin05t:322_3: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇapupphaṃ
tika-vin05t:323_1: yāni loke tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharanti,
tika-vin05t:323_3: nāmagaṇanavasena tesaṃ na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin05t:324_2: phalāni bhesajjāni bilaṅgaṃ pippaliṃ marīcaṃ harītakaṃ vibhītakaṃ āmalakaṃ goṭṭhaphalaṃ,
tika-vin05t:324_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin05t:325_2: Tesampi aparipakkāni acchivabimbavaraṇaketakakāsmarīādīnaṃ phalāni jātiphalaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ eḷā takkolanti
tika-vin05t:325_3: evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin05t:326_0: Aṭṭhikhādanīye labujaṭṭhi panasaṭṭhi ambāṭakaṭṭhi sālaṭṭhi khajjūrīketakatimbarūsakānaṃ taruṇaphalaṭṭhi
tika-vin05t:326_1: tintiṇikaṭṭhi bimbaphalaṭṭhi uppalapadumajātīnaṃ pokkharaṭṭhīti evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu manussānaṃ
tika-vin05t:326_2: pakatiāhāravasena khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikāni,
tika-vin05t:326_3: madhukaṭṭhi punnāgaṭṭhi harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīni siddhatthakaṭṭhi rājikaṭṭhīti evamādīni aṭṭhīni yāvajīvikāni.
tika-vin05t:327_0: Piṭṭhakhādanīye sattannaṃ tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ labujapiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:327_1: ambāṭakapiṭṭhaṃ sālapiṭṭhaṃ dhotakatālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhañcāti evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
tika-vin05t:327_2: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni,
tika-vin05t:327_3: adhotakaṃ tālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhaṃ assagandhādipiṭṭhāni ca yāvajīvikāni.
tika-vin05t:327_4: Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvehi mūlaphalehi ca saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:329_2: jatūni bhesajjāni hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatuṃ hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ takaṃ takapattiṃ takapaṇṇiṃ sajjulasaṃ,
tika-vin05t:329_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni bhesajjānī”ti –
tika-vin05t:330_1: Tattha yevāpanakavasena saṅgahitānaṃ ambaniyyāso kaṇikāraniyyāsoti evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin05t:330_2: Evaṃ imesu mūlakhādanīyādīsu yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ,
tika-vin05t:330_3: sabbampi imasmiṃ atthe avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmāti saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:331_1: Yāmakālikesu pana aṭṭha pānāni nāma ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ madhukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_3: Tattha ambapānanti āmehi vā pakkehi vā ambehi katapānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:331_4: Tattha āmehi karontena ambataruṇāni bhinditvā udake pakkhipitvā ātape ādiccapākena pacitvā parissāvetvā
tika-vin05t:331_7: Anupasampannehi kataṃ labhitvā pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenapi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:331_16: Muddikapānanti muddikā udake madditvā ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:331_19: Imāni aṭṭha pānāni sītānipi ādiccapākānipi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:332_6: sabbaṃ phalarasaṃ ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasa”nti vuttattā ṭhapetvā sānulomadhaññaphalarasaṃ aññaṃ phalapānaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin05t:332_9: navannañca mahāphalānaṃ sabbesañca pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇānaṃ anulomadhaññānaṃ raso yāvakāliko,
tika-vin05t:332_13: sabbaṃ pattarasaṃ ṭhapetvā ḍākarasa”nti vuttattā pakkaḍākarasaṃ ṭhapetvā yāvakālikapattānampi sītodakena madditvā kataraso vā ādiccapāko vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:332_16: sabbaṃ puppharasaṃ ṭhapetvā madhukapuppharasa”nti vuttattā madhukapuppharasaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbopi puppharaso vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:333_1: Sattāhakālikaṃ nāma sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitanti imāni pañca bhesajjāni.
tika-vin05t:333_2: Tattha sappi nāma gosappi vā ajikāsappi vā mahiṃsasappi vā yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati,
tika-vin05t:333_5: Telaṃ nāma tilatelaṃ sāsapatelaṃ madhukatelaṃ eraṇḍatelaṃ vasātelaṃ.
tika-vin05t:333_8: Yāvajīvikaṃ pana heṭṭhā yāvakālike mūlakhādanīyādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:334_1: Tattha aruṇodaye paṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikaṃ satakkhattumpi nidahitvā yāva kālo nātikkamati,
tika-vin05t:334_5: itaraṃ sati paccaye yāvajīvampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:334_6: Paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe tāva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:334_7: ajjhoharato pana ekamekasmiṃ ajjhohāre sannidhipaccayā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:334_10: gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin05t:334_14: tasmā pattaṃ dhovitvā puna tattha acchodakaṃ vā āsiñcitvā aṅguliyā vā ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo jānitabbo.
tika-vin05t:334_23: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:335_6: Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve,
tika-vin05t:335_10: pakatibhojane sannidhipaccayā ca vikālabhojanapaccayā ca dve pācittiyāni,
tika-vin05t:336_0: Sattāhakālikaṃ pana yāvajīvikañca āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhato paṭiggaṇhanapaccayā tāva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:337_2: sappi tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi nirāmisampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:337_9: purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:337_12: Sace anupasampanno purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena sappiṃ katvā deti,
tika-vin05t:337_16: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena yena kenaci katasappi sattāhampi nirāmisameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:337_17: uggahitakena kate pubbe vuttasuddhasappinayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:337_18: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrena vā dadhinā vā katasappi anupasampannena kataṃ sāmisampi tadahupurebhattaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:338_1: Navanītaṃ tāpentassa hi sāmaṃpāko na hoti,
tika-vin05t:338_2: sāmaṃpakkena pana tena saddhiṃ āmisaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:338_5: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:338_12: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā manussasappi ca navanītañca paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin05t:338_15: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanavanītampi purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:338_18: ekabhājanepi amissetvā piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ṭhapite piṇḍagaṇanāya nissaggiyāni.
tika-vin05t:338_22: Mahāsivatthero pana “bhagavatā anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:338_23: Tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dhovitvā dadhitakkamakkhikākipillikādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:338_24: Pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:338_25: Yaṃ tattha dadhigataṃ vā takkagataṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:338_27: Ettāvatā hi savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin05t:338_28: Āmisena saddhiṃ pakkattā pana tasmimpi kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakā.
tika-vin05t:338_29: Idāni uggahetvā ṭhapitanavanīte ca purebhattaṃ khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:338_30: tāni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca uggahitakehi katanavanīte ca akappiyamaṃsanavanīte ca sabbo āpattānāpattiparibhogāparibhoganayo
tika-vin05t:338_32: Telabhikkhāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ tattheva sappimpi navanītampi pakkatelampi apakkatelampi ākiranti.
tika-vin05t:338_33: Tattha takkadadhibindūnipi bhattasitthānipi taṇḍulakaṇāpi makkhikādayopi honti,
tika-vin05t:338_34: ādiccapākaṃ katvā parissāvetvā gahitaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:338_35: Paṭiggahetvā ca ṭhapitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ pacitvā natthupānampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:338_36: Sace vaddalisamaye lajjī sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti,
tika-vin05t:338_37: evaṃ aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna pacitvā deti,
tika-vin05t:339_1: Telesu tilatelaṃ tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:339_5: uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:339_8: Purebhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:339_12: Pacchābhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ anajjhoharaṇīyameva savatthukapaṭiggahitattā.
tika-vin05t:339_15: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakatilehi katatelepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:339_16: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitatile bhajjitvā vā tilapiṭṭhaṃ vā sedetvā uṇhodakena vā temetvā katatelaṃ sace anupasampannena kataṃ,
tika-vin05t:339_18: attanā kataṃ nibbaṭṭitattā purebhattaṃ nirāmisaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:339_20: Savatthukapaṭiggahitattā pana pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya ubhayampi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:339_23: Yadi pana appaṃ uṇhodakaṃ hoti abbhukkiraṇamattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:340_0: Sace pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitānaṃ sāsapādīnaṃ cuṇṇehi ādiccapākena sakkā telaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin05t:340_4: Yasmā pana sāsapamadhukacuṇṇāni sedetvā eraṇḍakaṭṭhīni ca bhajjitvā eva telaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:340_5: tasmā etesaṃ telaṃ anupasampannehi kataṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:340_6: vatthūnaṃ yāvajīvikattā pana savatthukapaṭiggahaṇe doso natthi.
tika-vin05t:340_13: tatiyadivase kataṃ pañcāhaṃ vaṭṭati, catuttha, pañcama, chaṭṭha,
tika-vin05t:340_21: Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatāni aññānipi nāḷikeranimbakosambakaramandādīnaṃ telāni atthi,
tika-vin05t:340_22: tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmayato dukkaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:341_2: pañca vasāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti evaṃ anuññātavasānaṃ telaṃ.
tika-vin05t:341_3: Ettha ca “acchavasa”nti vacanena ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasā anuññātā.
tika-vin05t:341_6: Macchādiggahaṇena cettha sabbesampi kappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasā anuññātā.
tika-vin05t:341_10: Anupasampannehi kataṃ nibbaṭṭitaṃ vasātelaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:341_12: Yaṃ pana tattha sukhumarajasadisaṃ maṃsaṃ vā nhāru vā aṭṭhi vā lohitaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:341_14: Sace pana vasaṃ paṭiggahetvā sayaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:341_15: purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā pacitvā parissāvetvā sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:341_16: Nirāmisaparibhogañhi sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti.
tika-vin05t:341_18: pacchābhattaṃ pana paṭiggahetuṃ vā kātuṃ vā na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:343_6: navanīte dadhiguḷikā vā takkabindu vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:343_10: ekato pacitvā ekato saṃsaṭṭhāni tejavantāni honti,
tika-vin05t:343_15: Mahāpadumatthero pana “idaṃ ki”nti paṭikkhipitvā “nanu vātābādhikā bhikkhū pañcamūlakasāvayāguyaṃ acchasūkaratelādīni pakkhipitvā yāguṃ pivanti,
tika-vin05t:343_16: sā tejussadattā rogaṃ niggaṇhātī”ti vatvā “vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:344_1: Madhu nāma madhukarīhi madhumakkhikāhi khuddakamakkhikāhi bhamaramakkhikāhi ca kataṃ madhu.
tika-vin05t:344_2: Taṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:344_5: Sace silesasadisaṃ mahāmadhuṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:344_13: Madhupaṭalaṃ vā madhusitthakaṃ vā sace madhunā amakkhitaṃ parisuddhaṃ,
tika-vin05t:344_16: Cīrikā nāma sapakkhā dīghamakkhikā tumbaḷanāmikā ca aṭṭhipakkhikā kāḷamahābhamarā honti,
tika-vin05t:345_1: Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchurasaṃ upādāya apakkā vā avatthukapakkā vā sabbāpi avatthukā ucchuvikati.
tika-vin05t:345_2: Taṃ phāṇitaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:345_5: Bahū piṇḍā cuṇṇe katvā ekabhājane pakkhittā honti ghanasannivesā,
tika-vin05t:345_9: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitena aparissāvitaucchurasena kataphāṇitaṃ sace anupasampannena kataṃ,
tika-vin05t:345_17: Purebhattaṃ pana parissāvitapaṭiggahitena kataṃ sace anupasampannena kataṃ,
tika-vin05t:345_21: pacchābhattaṃ parissāvitapaṭiggahitena kataṃ pana nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:345_23: “Jhāmaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:345_25: no vaṭṭatī”ti pucchaṃ katvā “ucchuphāṇitaṃ pacchābhattaṃ no vaṭṭanakaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:345_27: Sītodakena kataṃ madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:346_3: bhajjitvā tilādīhi missaṃ vā amissaṃ vā katvā koṭṭitaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:346_4: Yadi pana taṃ gahetvā merayatthāya yojenti,
tika-vin05t:346_11: pañca bhesajjānī”ti bhesajjanāmena anuññātattā bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā mā vā,
tika-vin05t:346_12: āhāratthaṃ pharituṃ samatthānipi paṭiggahetvā tadahupurebhattaṃ yathāsukhaṃ,
tika-vin05t:346_13: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sati paccaye vuttanayena sattāhaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni,
tika-vin05t:346_16: sakiṃ vā aṅguliyā gahetvā jivhāya sāyanamattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:346_20: kāyo vā kāye aru vā na makkhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:346_22: “Dvāravātapānakavāṭesupi hatthena gahaṇaṭṭhānaṃ na makkhetabba”nti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:346_23: “Kasāve pana pakkhipitvā dvāravātapānakavāṭāni makkhetabbānī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:346_24: Padīpe vā kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:346_25: Aññena pana bhikkhunā kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:346_27: “Anāpatti antosattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhetī”ti vacanato pana sattāhabbhantare sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani
tika-vin05t:346_28: telaṃ vā abbhañjanaṃ vā madhuṃ arumakkhanaṃ phāṇitaṃ gharadhūpanaṃ adhiṭṭheti anāpatti,
tika-vin05t:346_35: sahasāva bahu telaṃ pavisitvā purāṇatelaṃ ajjhottharati,
tika-vin05t:347_0: Sace pana sattāhātikkantaṃ anupasampannassa pariccajitvā deti,
tika-vin05t:347_1: puna tena attano santakaṃ katvā dinnaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:347_2: Sace hi so abhisaṅkharitvā vā anabhisaṅkharitvā vā tassa bhikkhuno natthukammatthaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin05t:347_6: aññena bhikkhunā vattabbo “atthi te sāmaṇera tela”nti? “Āma, bhante, atthī”ti.
tika-vin05t:347_9: Sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:348_1: Imesu pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti idameva dvayaṃ antovutthakañceva sannidhikārakañca hoti,
tika-vin05t:348_4: Yāvakālikaṃ pana attanā saddhiṃ sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti.
tika-vin05t:348_5: Yāmakālikaṃ dvepi sattāhakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin05t:348_6: sattāhakālikampi attanā saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ attano sabhāvaññeva upaneti,
tika-vin05t:348_7: tasmā yāvakālikena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sambhinnarasaṃ sesakālikattayaṃ tadahupurebhattameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:348_8: Yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:348_9: Sattāhakālikena pana tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati.
tika-vin05t:349_0: Sace pana ekato paṭiggahitānipi cattāri kālikāni sambhinnarasāni na honti,
tika-vin05t:349_1: tassa tasseva kālassa vasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:349_2: Sace hi challimpi anapanetvā sakaleneva nāḷikeraphalena saddhiṃ ambapānādipānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:349_10: Yāguyaṃ pakkhipitvā dinnasiṅgiverādīsupi telādīsu pakkhipitvā dinnalaṭṭhimadhukādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:349_12: taṃ taṃ ekato paṭiggahitampi yathā suddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:349_13: tathā dhovitvā tacchetvā vā tassa tassa kālassa vasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:353_3: catasso kappiyabhūmiyo ussāvanantikaṃ gonisādikaṃ gahapatiṃ sammuti”nti vacanato ussāvanantikā gonisādikā
tika-vin05t:353_4: gahapati sammutīti imā catasso kappiyabhūmiyo veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:353_6: yo thambhānaṃ vā upari bhittipāde vā nikhanitvā vihāro karīyati,
tika-vin05t:353_7: tassa heṭṭhā thambhapaṭicchakā pāsāṇā bhūmigatikā eva.
tika-vin05t:353_8: Paṭhamatthambhaṃ pana paṭhamabhittipādaṃ vā patiṭṭhāpentehi bahūhi samparivāretvā “kappiyakuṭiṃ karoma,
tika-vin05t:353_9: kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vācaṃ nicchārentehi manussesu ukkhipitvā patiṭṭhāpentesu āmasitvā vā sayaṃ ukkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:353_10: vā thambho vā bhittipādo vā patiṭṭhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:353_11: Kurundimahāpaccarīsu pana “kappiyakuṭi kappiyakuṭīti vatvā patiṭṭhāpetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:353_13: taṃ pana avatvāpi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayena vutte doso natthi.
tika-vin05t:353_14: Idaṃ panettha sādhāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ “thambhapatiṭṭhāpanañca vacanapariyosānañca samakālaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:353_15: Sace hi aniṭṭhite vacane thambho patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t:353_19: avassañhi ettha ekassapi vacananiṭṭhānañca thambhapatiṭṭhānañca ekato bhavissatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:353_20: Iṭṭhakāsilāmattikākuṭṭakāsu pana kuṭīsu heṭṭhā cayaṃ bandhitvā vā abandhitvā vā karontu,
tika-vin05t:353_22: taṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ vā silaṃ vā mattikāpiṇḍaṃ vā gahetvā vuttanayeneva kappiyakuṭi kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:353_23: iṭṭhakādayo bhittiyaṃ paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:353_26: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “thambhehi kariyamāne catūsu koṇesu cattāro thambhā,
tika-vin05t:353_27: iṭṭhakādikuṭṭe catūsu koṇesu dve tisso iṭṭhakā adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:354_4: Yattha senāsanāni sabbāni vā ekaccāni vā parikkhittāni,
tika-vin05t:354_8: “Ārāmo pana upaḍḍhaparikkhittopi bahutaraṃ parikkhittopi parikkhittoyeva nāmā”ti kurundimahāpaccarīsu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:355_4: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yasmā bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesasahadhammikānaṃ sabbesañca devamanussānaṃ hatthato
tika-vin05t:355_5: paṭiggaho ca sannidhi ca antovutthañca tesaṃ santakaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:355_6: tasmā tesaṃ gehāni vā tehi dinnakappiyakuṭi vā gahapatīti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:355_7: punapi vuttaṃ “bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāraṃ ṭhapetvā bhikkhunupassayo vā ārāmikānaṃ vā titthiyānaṃ vā devatānaṃ
tika-vin05t:355_8: vā nāgānaṃ vā api brahmānaṃ vimānaṃ kappiyakuṭi hotī”ti,
tika-vin05t:355_10: Saṅghasantakameva hi bhikkhusantakaṃ vā gehaṃ gahapatikuṭikā na hoti.
tika-vin05t:357_1: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ kappiyabhūmiṃ sammanneyya,
tika-vin05t:358_2: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa vihārassa kappiyabhūmiyā sammuti,
tika-vin05t:359_0: “Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo vihāro kappiyabhūmi khamati saṅghassa,
tika-vin05t:360_0: Kammavācaṃ avatvā apalokanakammavasena sāvetvā katāpi sammatā eva.
tika-vin05t:361_1: Yaṃ imāsu catūsu kappiyabhūmīsu vuttaṃ āmisaṃ,
tika-vin05t:361_4: Yaṃ pana akappiyabhūmiyaṃ sahaseyyappahonake gehe vuttaṃ saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā santakaṃ ekarattampi ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:362_1: sāmaṇero bhikkhussa taṇḍulādikaṃ āmisaṃ āharitvā kappiyakuṭiyaṃ nikkhipitvā punadivase pacitvā deti,
tika-vin05t:362_3: Tattha akappiyakuṭiyaṃ nikkhittasappiādīsu kiñci pakkhipitvā deti.
tika-vin05t:362_7: bhikkhu akappiyakuṭiyaṃ ṭhapitasappiñca yāvajīvikapaṇṇañca ekato pacitvā paribhuñjati,
tika-vin05t:362_12: Yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ bhikkhuno pacituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:362_13: Sacepissa uṇhayāguyā sulasipaṇṇāni vā siṅgiveraṃ vā loṇaṃ vā pakkhipanti,
tika-vin05t:362_17: Sace pana manussā pidahitvā denti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:362_19: khīratakkādīsu pana sakiṃ kuthitesu aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati punapākassa anuññātattā.
tika-vin05t:363_0: Imā pana kappiyakuṭiyo kadā jahitavatthukā honti?
tika-vin05t:363_1: Ussāvanantikā tāva yā thambhānaṃ upari bhittipāde vā nikhanitvā katā,
tika-vin05t:363_2: sā sabbesu thambhesu ca bhittipādesu ca apanītesu jahitavatthukā hoti.
tika-vin05t:363_3: Sace pana thambhe vā bhittipāde vā parivattenti,
tika-vin05t:363_7: Iṭṭhakādīhi katā cayassa upari bhittiatthāya ṭhapitaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ vā silaṃ vā mattikāpiṇḍaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā vināsitakāle jahitavatthukāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:363_9: tesu apanītesupi tadaññesu patiṭṭhātīti ajahitavatthukāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:363_10: Gonisādikā pākārādīhi parikkhepe kate jahitavatthukāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:363_11: Puna tasmiṃ ārāme kappiyakuṭiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:363_12: Sace pana punapi pākārādayo tattha tattha khaṇḍā honti,
tika-vin05t:363_15: Itarā pana dve gopānasīmattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbasmiṃ chadane vinaṭṭhe jahitavatthukāva honti.
tika-vin05t:363_16: Sace gopānasīnaṃ upari ekampi pakkhapāsakamaṇḍalaṃ atthi, rakkhati.
tika-vin05t:364_3: Anupasampannassa datvā tassa santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:364_5: karavikatissatthero kira vinayadharapāmokkho mahāsīvattherassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin05t:364_9: gāmato sappikumbho ābhato lūkhadivase sappinā bhuñjanatthāyā”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:364_13: Tissatthero puna ekadivasaṃ āgato taṃ disvā tatheva pucchitvā “bhante,
tika-vin05t:364_18: tayā ‘na vaṭṭatī’ti vutte so kumbho bahi nikkhitto corehi haṭo”ti.
tika-vin05t:364_21: anupasampannassa hi datvā tassa santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:368_1: Khādanīyādipaṭiggāhoti ajjhoharitabbassa yassa kassaci khādanīyassa vā bhojanīyassa vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:368_7: devo vā manusso vā tiracchānagato vā kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhena nissaggiyena vā deti,
tika-vin05t:368_8: tañce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-vin05t:369_0: Tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ vasena evaṃ hatthapāso veditabbo –
tika-vin05t:369_8: dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin05t:369_9: tassa orimantena paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyyahattho hatthapāso nāma.
tika-vin05t:370_0: Sace pana dāyakapaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti,
tika-vin05t:370_3: ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin05t:370_10: Evarūpe hatthapāse ṭhatvā sacepi pakkhī mukhatuṇḍakena vā hatthī vā soṇḍāya gahetvā pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā deti,
tika-vin05t:370_12: Sace pana aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanassapi hatthino khandhe nisinno tena soṇḍāya dīyamānaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:370_14: Hatthādīsu yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena antamaso pādaṅguliyāpi dīyamānaṃ kāyena dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:370_16: Yena kenaci hi sarīrāvayavena gahitaṃ kāyena gahitameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:370_17: Sacepi natthukaraṇiyaṃ dīyamānaṃ nāsāpuṭena akallako vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:371_1: Kaṭacchuādīsu pana yena kenaci upakaraṇena dinnaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:371_3: Yena kenaci hi sarīrasambaddhena pattathālakādinā gahitaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena gahitameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:371_4: Kāyato pana kāyapaṭibaddhato ca mocetvā hatthapāse ṭhitassa kāye vā kāyapaṭibaddhe vā pātiyamānampi nissaggiyena payogena dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:371_5: Eko bahūni bhattabyañjanabhājanāni sīse katvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ āgantvā ṭhitakova “gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:371_9: bhikkhunā hatthaṃ pasāretvā heṭṭhimabhājanaṃ ekadesenapi sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:371_11: Tato paṭṭhāya oropetvā ugghāṭetvā vā yaṃ icchati,
tika-vin05t:372_0: Kājena bhattaṃ harantopi sace kājaṃ onametvā deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:372_8: Sace pana kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā hatthena ussiñcitvā deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:372_9: Bahū pattā mañce vā pīṭhe vā kaṭasāre vā doṇiyaṃ vā phalake vā ṭhapitā honti,
tika-vin05t:372_11: tattha ṭhatvā paṭiggahaṇasaññāya mañcādīni aṅguliyāpi phusitvā ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā nipannena vā yaṃ tesu pattesu dīyati,
tika-vin05t:373_0: Pathaviyaṃ pana sacepi kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā honti,
tika-vin05t:373_1: yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vā sūciyā vā phusitvā nisinno hoti,
tika-vin05t:373_3: Yattha katthaci mahākaṭasārahatthattharaṇādīsu ṭhapitapatte paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:373_5: hatthapāse pana sati yattha katthaci vaṭṭati aññatra tatthajātakā.
tika-vin05t:373_6: Tatthajātake pana paduminipaṇṇe vā kiṃsukapaṇṇādimhi vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:373_9: evaṃ khāṇuke bandhitvā ṭhapitamañcādimhi asaṃhārime phalake vā pāsāṇe vā na ruhatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:373_11: Bhūmiyaṃ atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesu paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati.
tika-vin05t:373_14: Sace hatthapāsaṃ atikkammaṭhito dīghadaṇḍakena uḷuṅkena deti,
tika-vin05t:373_16: Vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā vā patte ākiratiyeva,
tika-vin05t:373_18: Dūre ṭhatvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ khipantepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:374_1: Sace pattathavikato nīhariyamāne patte rajanacuṇṇāni honti,
tika-vin05t:374_3: asati rajanacuṇṇaṃ puñchitvā paṭiggahetvā vā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:374_4: Sace piṇḍāya carantassa patte rajaṃ patati,
tika-vin05t:374_7: taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjato anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:374_8: Sace pana “paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vutte vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva,
tika-vin05t:374_11: Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin05t:374_13: “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:374_14: Evaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā vihāraṃ vā āsanasālaṃ vā gantvā taṃ anupasampannassa datvā puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:374_15: Sace bhikkhācāre sarajaṃ pattaṃ bhikkhussa deti,
tika-vin05t:374_16: so vattabbo “imaṃ paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ vā gaṇheyyāsi paribhuñjeyyāsi vā”ti,
tika-vin05t:374_22: Anupasampanne asati hatthato amocenteneva yattha anupasampanno atthi,
tika-vin05t:374_28: Yāguṃ vā sūpaṃ vā purato ṭhapetvā āluḷentānaṃ bhājanato phusitāni uggantvā patte patanti,
tika-vin05t:375_1: Uḷuṅkena āharitvā dentānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patanti, supatitā,
tika-vin05t:375_3: Sacepi carukena bhatte ākiriyamāne carukato masi vā chārikā vā patati,
tika-vin05t:375_5: Anantarassa bhikkhuno dīyamānaṃ pattato uppatitvā itarassa patte patati,
tika-vin05t:375_8: Sace jajjharisākhādiṃ phāletvā ekassa bhikkhuno dentānaṃ sākhato phusitāni aññassa patte patanti,
tika-vin05t:375_11: tassa patte patitesu dātukāmatāya abhihaṭattā doso natthi.
tika-vin05t:375_17: Āsanasālāya pattaṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhu niddaṃ okkanto hoti,
tika-vin05t:375_21: Sace pana ābhogaṃ katvā nisinno hoti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:375_22: Sacepi so hatthena ādhārakaṃ muñcitvā pādena pelletvā niddāyati,
tika-vin05t:375_24: Pādena ādhārakaṃ akkamitvā paṭiggaṇhantassa pana jāgarantassapi anādarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:375_26: Keci “evaṃ ādhārakena paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhena paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin05t:378_2: yaṃ dīyamānaṃ dāyakassa hatthato parigaḷitvā suddhāya vā bhūmiyā paduminipaṇṇe vā vatthakaṭasārakādīsu vā patati,
tika-vin05t:378_5: taṃ rajaṃ puñchitvā vā dhovitvā vā paṭiggahetvā vā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:378_6: Sace pavaṭṭantaṃ aññassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin05t:378_11: “Anāṇattenapi itarassa dassāmīti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:378_12: Kasmā panetaṃ itarassa bhikkhuno gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti?
tika-vin05t:378_14: Bhagavatā hi “sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vadantena yasseva taṃ dīyamānaṃ patati,
tika-vin05t:378_15: tassa appaṭiggahitakampi taṃ gahetvā paribhogo anuññāto.
tika-vin05t:378_19: tasmā aññassa sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:378_20: tassa pana āṇattiyā vaṭṭatīti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin05t:378_22: tasmā yathāṭhitaṃyeva anāmasitvā kenaci pidahitvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivasepi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:378_25: Taṃ divasaṃyeva hi tassa sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhogo anuññāto,
tika-vin05t:378_26: na tato paranti ayampi kirettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin05t:379_9: Satthakaṃ dhovitvā phālitesu malaṃ na paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:379_15: Mūlabhesajjādīni pisantānaṃ vā koṭṭentānaṃ vā nisadanisadapotakaudukkhalamusalādīni khīyanti,
tika-vin05t:379_16: pariharaṇakavāsiṃ tāpetvā bhesajjatthāya takke vā khīre vā pakkhipanti,
tika-vin05t:379_22: Deve vassante piṇḍāya carantassa sarīrato vā cīvarato vā kiliṭṭhaudakaṃ patte patati,
tika-vin05t:379_25: Sace pana sattāhaṃ vassante deve suddhaṃ udakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:380_1: Sāmaṇerassa odanaṃ dentena tassa pattagataṃ acchupanteneva dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:380_3: Appaṭiggahite odanaṃ chupitvā puna attano patte odanaṃ gaṇhantassa uggahitako hoti.
tika-vin05t:380_4: Sace pana dātukāmo hutvā “āhara, sāmaṇera, pattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:380_7: puna “tavetaṃ mayā pariccatta”nti ca vutte “na mayhaṃ etenattho”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:380_11: Sace pana ādhārake ṭhitaṃ nirapekkho “gaṇhāhī”ti vadati,
