tika-vin05t:1584_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato ubhatokājaṃ harituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1584_7: ekatokājaṃ antarākājaṃ sīsabhāraṃ khandhabhāraṃ kaṭibhāraṃ olambaka”nti vacanato ekatokājādiṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1585_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato na dīghaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1585_10: caturaṅgulapacchimaṃ dantakaṭṭha”nti vacanato manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ caturaṅgulapacchimañca dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1586_7: sati karaṇīye porisaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhituṃ āpadāsu yāvadattha”nti vacanato na rukkhaṃ abhiruhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1586_8: sukkhakaṭṭhagahaṇādikicce pana sati purisappamāṇaṃ abhiruhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1586_9: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigādayo vā disvā maggamūḷho vā disā oloketukāmo hutvā davaḍāhaṃ vā udakoghaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ disvā atiuccampi rukkhaṃ ārohituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1587_7: sakāya niruttiyā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇitu”nti vacanato vedaṃ viya buddhavacanaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāya vācanāmaggaṃ ārocetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1588_7: kāḷo bako iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ neva pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1589_7: gihīnaṃ ‘jīvatha bhante’ti vuccamānena ‘ciraṃ jīvā’ti vattu”nti vacanato khipite “jīvā”ti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1589_8: gihinā pana “jīvathā”ti vuccamānena “ciraṃ jīvā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1590_7: ābādhapaccayā lasuṇaṃ khāditu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā lasuṇaṃ khādituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1590_9: Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā vā tele vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilasākādīsu
tika-vin05t:1590_10: vā uttaribhaṅgesu vā yattha katthaci antamaso yāgubhattepi pakkhittaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1591_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato adhotehi pādehi mañcapīṭhādisenāsanaṃ parikammakatā vā bhūmi na akkamitabbā. “Na,
tika-vin05t:1591_7: yo akkameyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato yehi akkantaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:1591_8: evarūpehi allapādehi paribhaṇḍakatā bhūmi vā senāsanaṃ vā na akkamitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1591_15: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dhotapādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ saupāhanena akkamituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1592_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato parikammakatāya bhūmiyā na niṭṭhubhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1592_10: coḷakena paliveṭhetu”nti vacanato sudhābhūmiyā vā paribhaṇḍabhūmiyā vā mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhipantena sace taṭṭikā vā kaṭasārako vā natthi,
tika-vin05t:1592_14: Yadi pana tattha nevāsikā anatthatāya bhūmiyāpi ṭhapenti,
tika-vin05t:1593_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato parikammakatā bhitti setabhitti vā hotu cittakammakatā vā,
tika-vin05t:1593_7: dvārampi vātapānampi apassenaphalakampi pāsāṇatthambhampi rukkhatthambhampi cīvarena vā yena kenaci appaṭicchādetvā apassituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin05t:1593_10: paccattharitvā nipajjitu”nti vacanato pana dhotapādehi akkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1593_11: paribhaṇḍakataṃ bhūmiṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ senāsanaṃ vā saṅghikamañcapīṭhaṃ vā attano santakena paccattharaṇena paccattharitvāva nipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1593_12: Sace niddāyatopi paccattharaṇe saṅkuṭite koci sarīrāvayavo mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā phusati,
tika-vin05t:1593_16: Hatthatalapādatalehi pana phusituṃ akkamituṃ vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1593_17: mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā harantassa kāye paṭihaññati, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1594_12: abbhānāraho avandiyo”ti vacanato ime dasa avandiyāti veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1596_3: tīṇi tūlāni rukkhatūlaṃ latātūlaṃ poṭakītūla”nti vacanato imāni tīṇi tūlāni kappiyāni.
tika-vin05t:1596_4: Tattha rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1596_5: Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ yāsaṃ kāsañci vallīnaṃ tūlaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1596_6: Poṭakītūlanti poṭakītiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi tūlaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1596_8: Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo nāma natthi,
tika-vin05t:1596_9: tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1596_10: Bhisiṃ pana pāpuṇitvā sabbametaṃ akappiyatūlanti vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1596_12: haṃsamorādīnaṃ sabbasakuṇānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ sabbacatuppadānañca lomampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1596_13: piyaṅgupupphabakulapupphādīnaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1597_3: pañca bhisiyo uṇṇabhisiṃ coḷabhisiṃ vākabhisiṃ tiṇabhisiṃ paṇṇabhisi”nti vacanato pañcahi uṇṇādīhi pūritā pañca bhisiyo anuññātā.
tika-vin05t:1597_5: Tattha uṇṇaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ eḷakalomameva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1597_6: ṭhapetvā pana manussalomaṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ lomaṃ sabbaṃ idha uṇṇaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1597_7: Tasmā channaṃ cīvarānaṃ channaṃ anulomacīvarānañca aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1597_8: Eḷakalomāni pana apakkhipitvā kambalameva catugguṇaṃ pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1598_0: Coḷabhisiādīsu yaṃ kiñci navacoḷaṃ vā purāṇacoḷaṃ vā saṃharitvā anto pakkhipitvā vā katā coḷabhisi.
tika-vin05t:1598_1: Yaṃ kiñci vākaṃ pakkhipitvā katā vākabhisi.
tika-vin05t:1598_2: Yaṃ kiñci tiṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā tiṇabhisi.
tika-vin05t:1598_3: Aññatra suddhatamālapattā yaṃ kiñci paṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā paṇṇabhisīti veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1598_6: Yaṃ panetaṃ uṇṇādipañcavidhaṃ tūlaṃ bhisiyaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1598_8: Etena masūrakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:1598_10: mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti etāsaṃ anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1599_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti yesu kaṭito paṭṭhāya yāva sīsaṃ upadahanti,
tika-vin05t:1599_8: Sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ miniyamānaṃ vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca hoti,
tika-vin05t:1599_10: “Dīghato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vā”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1599_15: gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1599_17: tehi bimbohanaṃ mahantampi vaṭṭatī”ti phussadevatthero āha.
tika-vin05t:1599_18: Vinayadharaupatissatthero pana “bimbohanaṃ karissāmīti kappiyatūlaṃ vā akappiyatūlaṃ vā pakkhipitvā karontassa pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:1600_6: uccakampi āsandika”nti vacanato aṭṭhaṅgulato uccapādakopi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1600_7: Ekatobhāgena dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulato uccapādakaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1600_11: sattaṅga”nti vacanato tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañcopi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1600_14: uccakampi sattaṅga”nti vacanato ayampi pamāṇātikkanto ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1600_17: bhaddapīṭha”ntiādinā pāḷiyaṃ anuññātaṃ vettamayapīṭhaṃ pilotikābaddhapīṭhaṃ dārupaṭṭikāya upari pāde
tika-vin05t:1600_18: ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya kataṃ eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ āmalakākārena yojitaṃ bahupādakaṃ āmaṇḍakavaṭṭikapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1600_19: palālapīṭhaṃ phalakapīṭhañca pāḷiyaṃ anāgatañca aññampi yaṃ kiñci dārumayapīṭhaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1601_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato pamaṇātikkante mañce sayantassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1601_5: taṃ pana karontassa kārāpentassa ca chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1601_6: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjantena chinditvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1601_10: ukkhipitvā tulāsaṅghāṭe ṭhapetvā aṭṭaṃ katvā paribhuñjati, vaṭṭati. “Na,
tika-vin05t:1601_17: aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ mañcapaṭipādaka”nti vacanato manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamova mañcapaṭipādako vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1602_4: āsandi pallaṅko gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomi ekantalomi kaṭṭissaṃ koseyyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1602_5: kuttakaṃ hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ ajinapaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ sauttaracchadaṃ
tika-vin05t:1602_8: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato uccāsayanamahāsayanāni na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1603_0: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1603_3: Ajinapaveṇīti ajinacammehi mañcappamāṇena sibbitvā katā paveṇī.
tika-vin05t:1603_6: Taṃ kira setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ pattharitvā sibbitvā karonti.
tika-vin05t:1603_9: Setavitānampi heṭṭhā akappiyapaccattharaṇe sati na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1603_13: Yaṃ pana ekameva upadhānaṃ ubhosu passesu rattaṃ vā hotu padumavaṇṇaṃ vā vicitraṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1603_16: Gonakādīni saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā mañcapīṭhakesu attharitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:1604_2: ṭhapetvā tīṇi āsandiṃ pallaṅkaṃ tūlikaṃ gihivikataṃ abhinisīdituṃ,
tika-vin05t:1604_4: vacanato āsandādittayaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesesu gonakādīsu gihivikatesu dhammāsane vā bhattagge vā antaraghare vā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1604_6: Tūlonaddhaṃ pana mañcapīṭhaṃ bhattagge antaraghareyeva nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1604_8: Tūlonaddhaṃ pana mañcapīṭhaṃ kārāpentassapi uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1605_2: onaddhamañcaṃ onaddhapīṭha”nti vacanato pana cammādīhi onaddhaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1605_13: vacanato pāvārādīni saṅghikāni vā hontu puggalikāni vā,
tika-vin05t:1605_14: yathāsukhaṃ vihāre vā antaraghare vā yattha katthaci paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1606_2: sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato suvaṇṇarajatādivicitrāni kavāṭāni mañcapīṭhāni tālavaṇṭāni suvaṇṇarajatayoni pānīyaghaṭapānīyasarāvāni,
tika-vin05t:1607_16: vacanato paccantimesu janapadesu guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā navā vā hotu paribhuttā vā, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1607_23: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato paṭimuñcitvā apanītā paribhuttāyeva guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1607_25: Ekapaṭalā pana paribhuttā vā hotu aparibhuttā vā,
tika-vin05t:1607_27: Ettha ca manussacammaṃ ṭhapetvā yena kenaci cammena katā upāhanā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1608_20: Etāsu yaṃ kiñci labhitvā rajanaṃ coḷakena puñchitvā vaṇṇaṃ bhinditvā dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1610_15: Tattha khallakabaddhāti paṇhipidhānatthaṃ tale khallakaṃ bandhitvā katā.
tika-vin05t:1610_23: Meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikāti kaṇṇikaṭṭhāne meṇḍakasiṅgasaṇṭhāne vaddhe yojetvā katā.
tika-vin05t:1610_25: vicchikāḷikāpi tattheva vicchikanaṅguṭṭhasaṇṭhāne vaddhe yojetvā katā.
tika-vin05t:1610_26: Morapiñchaparisibbitāti talesu vā vaddhesu vā morapiñchehi suttakasadisehi parisibbitā.
tika-vin05t:1610_28: Etāsu yaṃ kiñci labhitvā sace tāni khallakādīni apanetvā sakkā honti vaḷañjituṃ,
tika-vin05t:1611_13: Tattha sīhacammaparikkhaṭā nāma pariyantesu cīvare anuvātaṃ viya sīhacammaṃ yojetvā katā.
tika-vin05t:1611_16: Etāsupi yā kāci taṃ cammaṃ apanetvā dhāretabbā.
tika-vin05t:1612_24: vacanato yena kenaci tiṇena vā aññena vā katā yā kāci saṅkamanīyā pādukā na dhāretabbā.
tika-vin05t:1612_29: vacanato pana bhūmiyaṃ suppatiṭṭhitā niccalā asaṃhāriyā vaccapādukādī tisso pādukā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1613_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato saupāhanena gāmo na pavisitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1613_7: gilānena bhikkhunā saupāhanena gāmaṃ pavisitu”nti vacanato pana yassa pādā vā phālitā pādakhīlā vā ābādho pādā vā dukkhā honti,
tika-vin05t:1613_8: yo na sakkoti anupāhano gāmaṃ pavisituṃ,
tika-vin05t:1613_9: evarūpena gilānena saupāhanena gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1613_12: ajjhārāme upāhanaṃ dhāretuṃ ukkaṃ padīpaṃ kattaradaṇḍa”nti vacanato ajjhārāme agilānassapi upāhanaṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1614_2: ācariyesu ācariyamattesu upajjhāyesu upajjhāyamattesu anupāhanesu caṅkamamānesu saupāhanena caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1614_5: vacanato ācariyādīsu anupāhanesu caṅkamantesu saupāhanena na caṅkamitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1614_6: Ettha ca pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo nissayācariyo uddesācariyoti ime cattāropi idha ācariyā eva.
tika-vin05t:1614_8: So hi catuvassakāle taṃ nissāya vacchati.
tika-vin05t:1614_14: ye vā pana keci dasavassehi mahantatarā,
tika-vin05t:1614_16: Ettakesu bhikkhūsu anupāhanesu caṅkamantesu saupāhanassa caṅkamato āpatti.
tika-vin05t:1615_13: vacanato majjhimadese sīhacammādi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ gahetvā pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1615_15: Bhūmattharaṇavasena pana aññattha anīharantena yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1616_2: sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammāni attharaṇāni eḷakacammaṃ ajacammaṃ migacamma”nti vacanako pana paccantimesu
tika-vin05t:1616_3: janapadesu yaṃ kiñci eḷakacammañca ajacammañca attharitvā nipajjituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1616_4: Migacamme eṇimigo vātamigo pasadamigo kuruṅgamigo migamātuko rohitamigoti etesaṃyeva cammāni vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:1618_0: Ye ca vāḷamigā keci, tesaṃ cammaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1619_2: yesaṃ vā pana cammaṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1619_3: te ṭhapetvā avasesā antamaso gomahiṃsasasabiḷārādayopi sabbe imasmiṃ atthe “vāḷamigā”tveva veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1619_4: Etesañhi sabbesaṃ pana cammaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1620_7: gilānassa yāna”nti vacanato agilānena bhikkhunā yānena na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1620_15: sivikaṃ pāṭaṅki”nti vacanato purisayuttaṃ hatthavaṭṭakaṃ sivikā pāṭaṅkī ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1620_16: Ettha ca purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā hotu purisasārathi vā, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1620_18: Hatthavaṭṭakaṃ pana itthiyo vā vaṭṭentu purisā vā,
tika-vin05t:1621_3: ahatānaṃ dussānaṃ ahatakappānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ ekacciyaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekacciyaṃ antaravāsakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1621_4: utuddhaṭānaṃ dussānaṃ catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ diguṇaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ diguṇaṃ antaravāsakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1621_6: pāpaṇike ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanato adhotānaṃ ekavāraṃ dhotānañca vatthānaṃ dupaṭṭā saṅghāṭi kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:1621_8: Utuddhaṭānaṃ pana hatavatthānaṃ pilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭi catugguṇā kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:1621_16: Tīsu pana cīvaresu dve vā ekaṃ vā chinditvā kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1623_0: Tasmā sace pahoti āgantukapattaṃ, na vaṭṭati, chinditabbameva.
tika-vin05t:1624_25: Sabbanīlakādīni rajanaṃ dhovitvā puna rajitvā dhāretabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1624_31: Kañcukaṃ labhitvā phāletvā rajitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1625_7: adhammakamme kayiramāne paṭikkositu”nti vacanato adhammakammaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1625_13: ekena adhiṭṭhātuṃ ‘na metaṃ khamatī”ti vacanato yattha nivārentassa bhikkhuno upaddavaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1625_17: Sace pana dve vā tayo vā honti,
tika-vin05t:1625_19: na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ aññassa santike attano diṭṭhi āvikātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1626_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato codentena “karotu me āyasmā okāsaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1626_5: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kārāpetvā codetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1626_7: Ayañhi adhippāyo nāma cāvanādhippāyo akkosādhippāyo kammādhippāyo vuṭṭhānādhippāyo uposathapavāraṇaṭṭhapanādhippāyo
tika-vin05t:1626_9: Tattha purimesu catūsu adhippāyesu okāsaṃ akārāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1626_10: okāsaṃ kārāpetvāpi sammukhā amūlakena pārājikena codentassa saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin05t:1626_14: Asammukhā pana sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1626_15: asammukhā eva sattavidhampi kammaṃ karontassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:1626_16: Kurundiyaṃ pana “vuṭṭhānādhippāyena ‘tvaṃ imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin05t:1626_17: taṃ paṭikarohī’ti vadantassa okāsakiccaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1626_19: ṭhapanakhettaṃ pana jānitabbaṃ “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1628_0: Anuvijjakassapi osaṭe vatthusmiṃ “atthetaṃ tavā”ti anuvijjanādhippāyena vadantassa okāsakammaṃ natthi.
tika-vin05t:1628_2: ayaṃ bhikkhu assamaṇo”tiādinā nayena anodissa dhammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi.
tika-vin05t:1628_3: Sace pana odissa niyametvā “asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti katheti,
tika-vin05t:1628_6: suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe okāso kārāpetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1628_8: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ akāraṇe vatthusmiṃ okāso na kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:1628_11: puggalaṃ tulayitvā okāsaṃ kātu”nti vacanato “bhūtameva nu kho āpattiṃ vadati,
tika-vin05t:1629_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato saddhādeyyaṃ na vinipātetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1629_6: mātāpitaro pana rajje ṭhitāpi patthayanti, dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1630_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato santaruttarena gāmo na pavisitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1631_10: vacanato pana gahetvā gantuṃ asamattho gilāno vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1631_12: evarūpesu paccayesu saṅghāṭiṃ aggaḷaguttivihāre ṭhapetvā santaruttarena gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1631_14: gutte eva vihāre nikkhipitvā bahi gantuṃ vaṭṭati, nāgutte.
tika-vin05t:1631_15: Āraññakassa pana vihāro na sugutto hoti,
tika-vin05t:1631_16: tena bhaṇḍukkhalikāya pakkhipitvā pāsāṇasusirarukkhasusirādīsu supaṭicchannesu ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1631_17: Uttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakānaṃ nikkhepepi imeyeva pañca paccayā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1632_2: sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā satthakammaṃ vā vatthikammaṃ vā kārāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1632_4: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vacanato yathāparicchinne okāse yena kenaci satthena vā sūciyā vā kaṇṭakena
tika-vin05t:1632_5: vā sattikāya vā pāsāṇasakkhalikāya vā nakhena vā chindanaṃ vā phālanaṃ vā vijjhanaṃ vā lekhanaṃ vā na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1632_7: Yena kenaci pana cammena vā vatthena vā vatthipīḷanampi na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1632_9: Ettha ca “sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā”ti idaṃ satthakammaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1632_11: Tattha pana khāraṃ vā dātuṃ yena kenaci rajjukena vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1632_15: tasmā “aṇḍaṃ phāletvā bījāni uddharitvā arogaṃ karissāmī”ti na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1632_17: Vaccamagge bhesajjamakkhitā ādānavaṭṭi vā veḷunāḷikā vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1633_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nahāpitapubbena khurabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1633_5: aññassa santakena pana kese chedetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1633_10: taṃ vā aññaṃ vā gahetvā kese chedetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1634_3: bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1634_4: Puggalikāni bījāni saṅghikāya bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbānī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1634_5: vacanato puggalikāya bhūmiyā saṅghikesu bījesu ropitesu saṅghikāya bhūmiyā vā puggalikesu bījesu ropitesu dasamabhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1634_7: tasmā dasa koṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmisāmikānaṃ dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1635_14: vacanato tādisaṃ kantāraṃ nittharantena pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1636_21: ime cattāro mahāpadese bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ nayaggahaṇatthāya āha.
tika-vin05t:1636_22: Tattha dhammasaṅgāhakattherā suttaṃ gahetvā parimaddantā idaṃ addasaṃsu.
tika-vin05t:1636_23: “Ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasa”nti satta dhaññarasāni “pacchābhattaṃ na kappatī”ti paṭikkhittāni.
tika-vin05t:1636_33: Ṭhapetvā hi sānulomaṃ dhaññaphalarasaṃ aññaṃ phalapānaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin05t:1637_3: cha cīvarāni khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅga”nti cha cīvarāni anuññātāni,
tika-vin05t:1637_4: dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi tesaṃ anulomāni dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ cīnapaṭṭaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ iddhimayaṃ devadattiyanti aparāni cha anuññātāni.
tika-vin05t:1637_9: itarāni dve kappāsikassa vā sabbesaṃ vā.
tika-vin05t:1638_0: Bhagavatā ekādasa patte paṭikkhipitvā dve pattā anuññātā lohapatto ca mattikāpatto ca.
tika-vin05t:1638_2: Bhagavatā tayo tumbā anuññātā lohatumbo kaṭṭhatumbo phalatumboti.
tika-vin05t:1638_6: Dussapaṭṭena rajjukena ca katakāyabandhanāni tesaṃyeva anulomāni.
tika-vin05t:1638_7: Setacchattaṃ kilañjacchattaṃ paṇṇacchattanti tīṇi chattāni anuññātāni.
tika-vin05t:1638_8: Ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ tesaṃyeva anulomanti iminā nayena pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca anupekkhitvā aññānipi kappiyākappiyānaṃ anulomāni vinayadharena veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1639_1: Vinayadharo ca puggalo vinayapariyattimūlake pañcānisaṃse chānisaṃse sattānisaṃse aṭṭhānisaṃse navānisaṃse dasānisaṃse ekādasānisaṃse labhati.
tika-vin05t:1641_0: Kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito?
tika-vin05t:1641_1: Idhekacco bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati alajjitā, aññāṇatā,
tika-vin05t:1644_1: Aññāṇapuggalo hi mando momūho kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto akattabbaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1644_5: Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā kappiyaṃ ce,
tika-vin05t:1645_16: Evamidhekacco bhikkhu imehi chahi ākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:1646_0: Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ na āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:1646_3: ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi nāpajjati.
tika-vin05t:1646_5: sahasā āpannampi desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti. Tato –
tika-vin05t:1648_0: Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo”ti. –
tika-vin05t:1650_6: Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ anāpattiṃ oloketvā kappiyaṃ ce hoti, karoti,
tika-vin05t:1650_17: Iti imehi chahi ākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati.
tika-vin05t:1650_20: Evamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito.
tika-vin05t:1651_1: Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā bhikkhū “asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī”ti dūratova
tika-vin05t:1651_3: So tehi katassa kammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattigarukalahukādibhedaṃ sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ desāpetvā,
tika-vin05t:1652_0: Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatīti avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ sārajjaṃ okkamati,
tika-vin05t:1653_0: Paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma attapaccatthikā ca sāsanapaccatthikā ca.
tika-vin05t:1653_1: Tattha mettiyabhūmajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1653_6: mahāsaṅghikādayo ca abuddhasāsanaṃ “buddhasāsana”nti vatvā katapaggahā sāsanapaccatthikā nāma.
tika-vin05t:1653_7: Te sabbepi sahadhammena sahakāraṇena vacanena yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin05t:1654_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena.
tika-vin05t:1654_2: Terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma.
tika-vin05t:1654_3: Cattāro maggā ca cattāri phalāni ca,
tika-vin05t:1655_1: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-vin05t:1655_2: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa pariyatti mūla”nti vadanti.
tika-vin05t:1655_3: Keci therā “ime ca subhadda bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1655_4: asuñño loko arahantehi assā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa paṭipatti mūla”nti vatvā “yāva pañca bhikkhū sammāpaṭipannā saṃvijjanti,
tika-vin05t:1655_6: Itare pana therā “pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi dhammābhisamayo natthī”ti vatvā āhaṃsu “sacepi
tika-vin05t:1655_7: pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhakā honti,
tika-vin05t:1655_8: te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā dasavaggaṃ gaṇaṃ pūretvā majjhimajanapade upasampadaṃ karissanti,
tika-vin05t:1655_9: etenupāyena vīsativaggaṃ saṅghaṃ pūretvā attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayissanti.
tika-vin05t:1655_10: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1655_11: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo ime tāva pañcānisaṃse paṭilabhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1656_1: Tassādheyyo uposatho pavāraṇā saṅghakammaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā,
tika-vin05t:1657_0: Yānipi imāni apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammanti cattāri saṅghakammāni,
tika-vin05t:1657_1: yā cāyaṃ upajjhāyena hutvā kulaputtānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:1657_3: Na hi añño dvipiṭakadharopi evaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:1657_14: byattena bhikkhunā ekena dve sāmaṇere upaṭṭhāpetuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1657_15: yāvatake vā pana ussahati ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ,
tika-vin05t:1657_17: Sāmaṇerupaṭṭhāpanaṃ paccāsīsanto pana vinayadharassa santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ sādituṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:1657_19: Iti imesu chasu ānisaṃsesu ekena saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti.
tika-vin05t:1657_24: sabbehipetehi saddhiṃ ekādasāti evaṃ vinayadharo puggalo pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava dasa ekādasa ca ānisaṃse labhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1670_0: Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yañcaññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
